loans.name: Mayra Aracely

texts.es:
La clienta Mayra vive en Quevedo. La intención de ella de comenzar su negocio de venta de ropa fue con su esposo, poco a poco comenzó  por su barrio vendiéndoles a sus vecinos y despues llego a venderle al resto de personas por referidos.

No tiene dificultad en su negocio vende ropa de mujer y hombre, esta casada su esposo se dedica a servicio de taxi, tiene 2 hijos los cuales están en una escuela fiscal. 

Con el préstamo va a comprar blusas, edredones y pantalones. Su sueño es poder tener un boutique propio como las demás personas que venden ropa.
texts.en:
Mayra lives in Quevedo. She set out to start a clothing sales business with her husband. Little by little she started out selling it around her neighborhood to her neighbors, and managed to sell to other people who were referred to her. 

She has no difficulties in her business. She sells women's and men's clothing, is married and her husband drives a taxi. She has two children who are in public school.

With the loan she is going to buy blouses, quilts and pants. Like other people who sell clothing, her dream is to be able to have her own shop.

loans.use: To buy blouses, quilts, pants.

loans.name: Rosemond

texts.en:
Rosemond is a 33-year-old jewelry seller. She resides in the Dansoman community. She joined ID Ghana in 2009 and is still doing very well.

She has been in this business for the past nine years and is still doing very well. She is very good and discreet when it comes to her business. 

This is her ninth loan and she needs GHS 2,500 to expand her business and buy more goods to enable her to sell to her customers.

loans.use: To buy more jewelry to sell to customers.

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es:
Eulogio nació en la ciudad de Salvación y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú).
 
Eulogio tiene 60 años de edad y es casado entonces tiene dos hijos, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante y su actividad económica principal es la agricultura, él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra plátanos, piña, yucas y maíz. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, fertilizante y otras cosas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Eulogio was born in the city of Salvación. He lives in the same city where he was born. (Salvación is located in the Manu district and province within the Madre de Dios department in Perú. 

Eulogio is 60 years old and married. He has two children. He is a hardworking and enterprising man who makes progress. His primary economic activity is farming. He has several plots where he plants bananas, pineapples, yucas, and corn. He has been involved with farming for several years. His business is going very well thanks to the determination he puts into his work. He belongs to the “Las Palmeras del Manu” communal bank. He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and other items.  He is grateful for and values the loan and commits to make his monthly installment payments.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizers and other items.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Neris Armando

texts.es: Neris de 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, él es una persona muy humilde pero emprendedora quien trabaja muy arduamente día con día. Neris posee una parcela en la que se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijole, la cual posteriormente comercializa en diferentes departamentos del país, obteniendo muy buenas ganancias. él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar pesticidas, abono y semillas de frijol y maíz de la mejor calidad para sembrar y así obtener una excelente cosecha para tener mejores ganancias y que le permita mejorar la estabilidad económica de su familia.
texts.en: 43-year-old Neris lives with his wife and children. He's a very modest yet enterprising person who works very hard on a daily basis. Neris owns a plot of land where he grows corn and beans. Later on he sells his produce in different deparments of the country, obtaining very good profits. He requests a loan from INTEGRAL with which he can purchase pesticide, compost and corn and bean seeds of the highest possible quality for sowing. That way he'll obtain an excellent crop so that he can get better profits, which will allow him to improve his family's financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 23-year-old single man. He is one of 11 siblings living all together in the same house. Mohammad goes to a governmental university and is majoring in historical studies. Now he is applying for an educational loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Solidario Solidarista Group

texts.es:
SOLIDARO SOLIDARISTA
MUNUELA ES MADRE SOLTERA TIENE DOS HIJAS DE 15 Y 10 AÑOS ELLA INICIO SU NEGOCIO HACE QUINCE AÑOS CUANDO SE SEPARO DE SU ESPOSO, YA QUE TENIA QUE LLEVAR EL SUSTENTO A SU HOGAR PARA SUS HIJAS, ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE(LACTEOS) COCOS, QUESO, CREMA Y REQUESON, TIENE UN PUESTO EN EL MERCADO DE SU LOCALIDAD, Y EL SUEÑO QUE ELLA TIENE A CORTO PLAZO ES PODER CONSTRUIRLO DE BLOCK YA QUE SOLO TIENE LAMINAS Y EN EL INVIERNO SE LE COMPLICAN UN POCO LAS VENTAS, ELLA ESTA SOLICITANDO ESTE CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS (LACTEOS) QUESO CREMA Y REQUESON
ELLA ESPERA QUE LE PUEDAN DAR ESE APOYO QUE NECECITA PARA SALIR ADELANTE EN SU NEGOCIO.
texts.en:
Munuela is a single mother of two daughters, ages 15 and 10. She started her business 15 years ago when she separated from her husband, since she needed to bring home income to take care of her kids. She sells dairy products like cheese, cream, ricotta, and coconuts. She has a stall in the market in her town. Her short-term dream is to be able to make a stall out of cinder block since right now she only has tin sheeting and in the winter the winds can make things complicated. 

She is asking for this loan to buy diary products. She hopes that you will give her the support needed to move forward with her business.

loans.use: to buy dairy products to sell.

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en: Eyad is a 20-year-old single man. He is the oldest brother of three siblings. Eyad works in a mall to at least cover his own expenses and save a little to pay for his education. Eyad is an industrial engineering student working hard to get his bachelor's degree. He is applying for an educational loan to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for his next semester fees.

loans.name: Laura Angelica

texts.es:
La clienta Laura vive en Quevedo. Comenzó a ver la necesidad que preservaban  en aquellos tiempos sus hijos y ella empezó entregando comida a las personas que trabajaban en buses hasta que puso su propio negocio en la esquina de su casa de venta de comida, poco a poco fue incrementando su negocio. Tambien Laura tieneun negocio de venta de ropa para mejorar sus ingresos. 

No tiene ninguna dificultad, no es casada, si tiene hijos los cuales estudian en escuela fiscal. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar alimentos, carnes, vegetales, edredones y sabanas. Su sueño es tener un boutique propio o su restaurante para poder estabilizar a su familia.
texts.en:
Laura lives in Quevedo. She began to see the need in those times to support her children, and began delivering food to the people who work on buses, until she set up her own business in a corner of her home selling food. Little by little the business began growing. 

Laura also has a business selling clothing, in order to improve her income. She has no difficulty, she is not married and does have children who go to public school. 

With the loan she wants to buy food, meat, vegetables, quilts and sheets. Her dream is to have her own shop or restaurant so that she can stabilize her family.

loans.use: To buy food, meat, vegetables, quilts and sheets.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es:
Doña Domitila es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora de 60 años y que a pesar de su edad ella no deja de soñar en grande. Tiene un grado de educación cursado hasta el 3 grado de la primaria y no pudo continuar ya que sus padres no pudieron apoyarla por la falta de dinero. Ella es casada y junto a su esposo y sus hijos se dedican a la siembra y cultivo de café, mismo que ha sido medio de ingreso para sus padres y hoy en día para su familia. Ella tiene mucha experiencia ya que desde muy pequeña fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra y junto a su familia por mas de 40 años. Sus clientes son intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos, y demás que comercializan este producto como lo es el café. El terreno que ellos cultivan es propio y lo adquirieron con mucho esfuerzo y mucho trabajo ahorrando y restringiendoce de muchas cosas para poder tener donde cultivar y no alquilar.

Hoy en día solicita ayuda para poder comprar Semilla certificada, fertilizantes, abono, plaguicidas, y una bomba de fumigación para poder cultivar un poco mas de café ya que esto vendrá a aumentar las ganancias mediante la cantidad de café cultivado.

Sus planes a futuro es tener una amplia plantación de café la cual pueda seguirles dando bendiciones, sustento familiar y pueda ser trabajada de generación en generación por sus hijos, sus nietos, y las próximas generaciones como hasta el día de hoy se hace formando un patrimonio familiar.
texts.en:
Domitila is a hard-working, enterprising woman who's 60 years old. Despite her age, she doesn't stop dreaming big. She completed her education up to the third grade of elementary school and wasn't able to continue because her parents couldn't support her due to a lack of money. She's married and grows coffee alongside her husband and children. This was her parents' means of livelihood and nowadays it's her family's. She has gotten a great deal of experience, because her parents taught her to do farming work when she was very young and she has done that alongside her family for over 40 years. Her customers are middlemen who come to the area, neighbors and other people who sell produce such as coffee. They own the land where they sow. They acquired it with a lot of effort and a lot of work, by saving money and cutting down on several things so they could have a place to sow without having to rent.

She's currently requesting help in order to purchase certified seeds, fertilizer, compost, pesticide and a spray pump so that she can grow a bit more coffee. This will increase her profits due to the amount of coffee that will be grown.

Her plan for the future is to own a large coffee farm which may continue to provide them with blessings and a livelihood for her family. She also hopes that it may be passed down from generation to generation by her children, her grandchildren and the generations to come, as it has been done until now, therefore becoming a family heritage.

loans.use: to purchase certified seeds, fertilizer, compost, pesticide and a spray pump in order to grow coffee.

loans.name: Carlos Julio

texts.es:
El clienta Carlos vive en Quevedo.  Comenzo aprendiendo confeccion poco a poco mejoro su negocio en la actualidad tiene un taller de costura y confeccion. Hace su trabajo desde las 10h00 hasta las 22h00. La dificultad en su negocio es el tiempo ya que tiene mucha clientela, no es casado ni tiene hijos.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar maquinas industriales para mejorar la costura de las prendas que hace. Su sueño es tener mas operarios y empleados.
texts.en:
Carlos lives in Quevedo.  He began learning dressmaking little by little. He improved his business and currently has a sewing and dressmaking workshop. 

He works from 10:00am. to 10:00pm. The challenge in his business is time, as he has many customers. He is not married, nor does he have children. 

With the loan he wants to buy industrial sewing machines so that he can improve the sewing of the articles of clothing he makes. His dream is to have more operators and employees.

loans.use: To buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina de 23 años de edad, convive con el padre de su pequeño hijo de 6 años. Ellos viven en la casa de los padres de Cristina el cual se ubica en un anexo rural y agrícola.Cristina se dedica a la agricultura y actividades de costura. Pero manifiesta que la siembra le trae mayores satisfacciones. En los terrenos que heredó de sus padres y suegros produce papas, arvejas, habas y flores de gladiolos ,junto a su pareja traslada toda la cosecha hasta los mercados, y cada vez que obtienen los ingresos, disponen el dinero inteligentemente, para los gastos diarios y otro monto para invertir en el campo.Cristina tiene como meta la construcción de su propa vivienda , pero por ahora continuará con las siembras, aprovechando las lluvias del mes.Éste es su segundo crédito con kiva, por eso se compromete en ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Cristina, invertirá los S/. 2000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Cristina, 23, lives with the father of her 6 year old son. They live in Cristina's parents' home in a rural and agriculture area. Cristina works in agriculture as well as sewing, but she says that the planting brings her greater satisfaction. On the land that she inherited from her parents and in-laws, she grows potatoes, peas, lima beans and gladiolus flowers. Together with her partner she transports the whole harvest to the market and every time that they get money they use it smartly. Part of it goes to daily expenses and another part to invest in their fields. 

Cristina's goal is to build her own home, but for now she will keep planting her crops, taking advantage of this month's rains. This is her second loan with Kiva and she promises to make her payments punctually. She will invest the 2000 soles in the purchase of organic compost for her plants.

loans.use: to buy organic compost.

loans.name: Musheera

texts.en: Musheera is a 40-year-old married woman. Her husband is a civilian officer. They are supporting four children. Musheera has a small home business selling clothing items, mostly female casual clothing. She is now applying for a loan to increase the quantity and the variety of the collection she has of women's clothing to include some formal outfits and teenagers' clothes.

loans.use: to add some formal outfits and teenagers' clothes to what she sells

loans.name: Vida

texts.en:
Vida is a 34-year-old food seller. She is married to Victor, a 39-year-old civil servant. They are blessed with a child who is in junior high school.

In 2010, she needed capital to start up her small business. A friend introduced her to ID Ghana and she is enjoying the benefits. Vida is very hardworking, companionable and customer-friendly. She has been in business for the past four years and is still doing very well in the community. 

This is her seventh loan and she needs a loan of 2,000 GHS to enable her to buy more goods to satisfy her customers' demand.

loans.use: To buy more goods to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rola

texts.en: Rola is a 20-year-old single lady. She has two older brothers. Rola is a second-year student at the university. She is majoring in literature and English language. She is applying for an educational loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Don Andrés de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijas, es un hombre   trabajador y responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar desde hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside y también a la siembra de caña y café. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, quiere comprar vitaminas y concentrado para su ganado pero con las ganancias que obtiene no le alcanza para poder hacer esos gastos por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo antes mencionado  para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: Andres, 56, lives in his own home with his wife and two daughters. He is a hardworking man and has been responsible with his obligations to his household. For some years now he has worked producing and selling dairy products in the zone where he lives, as well as planting sugar cane and coffee. He has good clientele because he knows how to win the trust of his customers. He offers quality products at a good price. He wants to buy vitamins and concentrated feed for his cattle but with his profits he doesn't have enough for these expenses. For that reason he asks for a loan that will allow him to buy the aforementioned products in order to continue with his work, which is his only source of income, so that he can continue giving his family a better quality of life without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and concentrated feed for his cattle.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 33-year-old father of three kids. He is supporting his family from the income he makes from selling carpets and rugs in his store. Now he is applying for a loan to buy more carpets in more sizes and different materials in order to have variety in his collection and the prices he offers.

loans.use: to buy more carpets in more sizes and different materials to sell in the store

loans.name: Latifa

texts.en: Latifa is a 55 years old and a mother of five children. Her husband is now receiving a retirement salary from the military. At the same time, Latifa makes beautiful pottery pieces for decoration and she sells mobile credit cards on the side to help in supporting the family. Latifa wishes that she will be able to open her own pottery workshop in the future, but for now she is applying for a loan to buy some raw materials and paints to decorate the pottery after it’s done.

loans.use: to buy some raw materials and paints to decorate pottery

loans.name: Las Vikis Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por  cinco socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Alexandra tiene 32 años de edad, acompañada con dos hijos de 8 y 9 años de edad, tiene siete años de tener su negocio es un cafetín ambulante que ofreces sus productos a un recorrido estudiantil de niños de primaria ella  les vende pizzas, jugos de lata, jugos de cajas, hamburguesas etc., tiene dos años de ser cliente de la institución. Con el crédito anterior logro surtir más productos en  variedad  en las comidas y el abastecimiento de productos a otros recorridos de estudiantes de primaria, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas, bisuterías, pan, mortadelas, mayonesas, vegetales, jugos de latas, jugos de cajas, pizzas etc.Lidieth tiene 27 años de edad su negocio es el alquiler de videos juegos en su domicilio, Cony tiene 50 años y vende bisuterías y ropa nueva, Mireya tiene 48 años de edad tiene una mini pulpería en su  domicilio e Idania tiene 36 años de edad vende chiverías también en un recorrido escolar.
texts.en:
This group has 5 entrepreneurial members, one of who is Alexandra, 32 years old. She has two children, ages 8 and 9. She has been running a small mobile cafe for 7 years where she offers her products on the route that primary school students take to school. She sells pizzas, juice boxes, canned juices, hamburgers, etc. 

She has been with the institution for 2 years. With her previous loan she stocked more products and and a greater variety of goods and had enough to offer on other routes to school. She will invest this loan in the purchase of sodas, bread, bologna, mayonaise, vegetables, miscellaneous goods, juice boxes, juices in cans, pizzas, etc. 

Lideth, 27, rents video games out of her home.

Cony, 50, sells costume jewelry and new clothing.

Mireya, 48, has a small grocery store in her home.

Idania, 36, sells snacks on a school route.

loans.use: to buy sodas, bread, bologna, mayonaise, vegetables and miscellaneous goods that are the main ingredients for hamburgers, as well as juices, pizzas, etc

loans.name: Jawahir

texts.en: Jawahir is a widow who was left to look after her children, so she started selling clothes at home to make a living. Now Jawahir is applying for a loan to enhance the showing area of the clothes to help organize the products she has has by bringing in more clothes hangers and stands, and also adding a new female summer collection to what she has.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes hangers and stands, and also add a new female summer collection.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Doña Maria de 59 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura cultiva maíz y frijol, es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar vive en casa propia con su familia, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la vende en los comercios de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar fertilizantes, abonos, semillas y herramientas para su cultivo de maíz y frijol y asi seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
María, 59, is a hardworking person who's very responsible with her household obligations.  She lives in her own house with her family.

She makes a living in agriculture growing corn and beans.  When her harvest is ready she sells it in the grain businesses near her house.  With the profits she makes from her sales she's able to cover some of the household expenses.

María's requesting a loan to be able to buy fertilizer, soil amendments, seed, and tools for her corn and bean crops so she can continue putting food on the table in her household every day.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, fertilizer, seed, etc.

loans.name: Wendnasongue Group

texts.fr:
Mme SITA est responsable du groupe WENDNASONGUE. Mariée, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 06ans et le moins âgé a 02ans.  01 va à l’école.
Mme vend des pagnes, des mèches et pommades  depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de leur quartier. Ses clients sont les femmes du quartier.
Elle veut s’acheter  07 complets pagnes.
Mme veut  renforcer son activité avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir  son activité et aider son mari pour les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Sita is the representative of the WENDNASONGUE group.  She is married and the mother of two children, aged 6 and 2, one of whom is in school.

She has been selling "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics), hair extensions and ointments for the past six years.  She buys her goods at the local market and resells to women in her neighborhood.

She wants to buy seven pagnes, (each measuring 1 x 3 meters).

Sita wants to use her profits to boost her business.  Her ambition is to expand her activity and to help her husband cover the family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy seven "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics).

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is a hardworking married man with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He operates a salon, and he has also been a primary teacher since 2011. He started the business with a goal of opening several branches in the busy areas of Fort Portal; however, limited capital has been a challenge to his dream. His personal dream is to become a school principal after upgrading his studies. Emmanuel intends to use the loan to pay tuition fees for himself.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for himself.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Doña marta de 47 años de edad vive con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, Marta es una mujer dedicada a su labor, luchadora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar:  abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc.  y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía que es donde siembra sus cosechas, tiene buenas referencias de pago y está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Marta, 47, lives with her three children.  She makes a living in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans.  She has worked in this business for many years and has a lot of very valuable experience, which allows her to get the best harvests.  She sells in all the neighboring areas and has a lot of steady customers.  Marta's a woman who's dedicated to her work, a striver who's always prepared to work hard to achieve success.

She wants to make the most of the growth of her business to increase production and have better profits.  She needs to invest in supplies but she needs capital, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy soil amendments, insecticide, tools, etc., and to improve the land where she grows her crops, which is shown in the photograph.

She has a good payment record and is certain she'll be able to repay her debt on time.  She's also confident she'll be able to give her family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, fertilizer, and seed, and to improve her plot of land

loans.name: Anor

texts.ru: Анор 47 лет. Она замужем и является многодетной матерью. У нее 8 детей. Анор со своей большой семьей проживает в районе Файзабад, расположенный в 60 км восточнее города Душанбе. Анор зарабатывает на жизнь путем торговли. Она работает продавщицей в продуктовом магазине, который находится на рынке района. Анор в основном продает детское питание, шоколад, печенье, рулет, майонез, консервированные продукты и т.д. Кредит берет для закупа продуктов питания с целью товарооборота.
texts.en:
Anor is 47 years old and married.  She is the mother of a large family (she has eight children).  She and her family live in the Fayzabad district of Tajikistan, 60 kilometers east of the city of Dushanbe.  

Anor makes a living working in retail.  She works as a saleswoman in a grocery store located at her local market.  She mostly sells baby food, chocolate, cookies, rolls, mayonnaise, canned food etc.

She is requesting a loan to buy food products in order to renew her inventory.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to renew her inventory.

loans.name: Carmen Zenovia

texts.es:
Carmen nació en la ciudad de Sicuani pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación.  (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú). 

Carmen tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante su familia. Su actividad económica es la venta de frutas, ella lleva sus productos y los distribuye en diferentes mercados de la ciudad  del Cusco. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como piñas y platanos. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Carmen was born in the city of Sicuani but lives in Salvación.  (The city of Salvación is in the Manu district, which is in the Manu province in the department of Madre de Díos, Peru).

Carmen is 38 years old.  She is married and has four children with her husband.  Carmen is a hard-working and responsible mother who is helping her family to prosper.  She makes a living selling fruits, taking them and distributing them in the different markets in the city of Cusco.  She has now had the business for some years and, thanks to her determination, it is going well.  Carmen is part of the "Las Palmeras del Manu" communal bank and, on this occasion, is applying for a loan to buy fruits such as pineapples and bananas.  She is grateful for and knows the value of this loan and promises to make her monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy fruits such as pineapples and bananas.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario nació en la ciudad de Cusco pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú). 

Mario tiene 59 años de edad y es separado pero tiene cuatro hijos, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante y su actividad económica principal es la venta de ceviche, él tiene un puesto de venta en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Salvación. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo limón, cebolla, ajos, lechuga, maíz y otras cosas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Mario was born in the city of Cusco but he lives in the city of Salvación. (The city of Salvación is located in the district and province of Manu in the department of Madre de Dios, Peru). 

Mario is 59 years old and separated, but he has four children. He is a hard-working and enterprising person who gets ahead and his main job is selling ceviche. He has a stall in one of the markets in the city of Salvación. He has had the business for several years now and it is going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. He belongs to the communal bank “Las Palmeras del Manu” and he requires the loan in order to buy supplies, such as lemon, onion, garlic, lettuce, corn, etc. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his monthly repayments.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as lemon, onion, garlic, lettuce, corn, etc

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Strong Woman Group

texts.es: Grupo está formado por cuatro socias emprendedoras de éxitos una de ellas es Carla mujer de 36 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de edad, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a vender aceites de vehículos, lubricantes, aditivos, refrigerantes, etc. tiene un años de ser cliente de la institución, con el crédito anterior logro comprar productos nuevos que no tenía en existencias como el aceite 15 w 40 por ejemplo. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de aceite 20w50, aceite 20w40, aceite 20w60, aceite 15w40, aceite dos tiempos castrol, aceite dos tiempos yamalub, aceite sac 50 etc. Flor tiene 43 años de edad y su negocio es  la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, Martha tiene 37 años de edad y su negocio es una ferretería y una mini pulpería y Nidia tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es venta de fritanga y una mini pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This group is composed of four enterprising and successful partners. One of them is Carla, a woman of 36 who is married with two younger children. For 15 years, she has worked selling vehicle oils, lubricants, additives, refrigerants, etc. 

She has been a part of this organization for one year. With the previous loan, she purchased new products that she hadn’t had in stock; for example, 15W-40 oil. She will invest this loan in the purchase of 20W-50, 20W-40, 20W-60, 15W-40, 2T castrol oil, 2T Yamalube oil, SAE 50 oil, etc. 

Flor is 43 years old and has a business selling Avon cosmetics. Martha is 37, and her businesses are a hardware store and a small food store. Nidia is 52 years old and has a business selling fried food; she also has a small food store in her home.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle lubricants like 20W-50, 20W-20, 20W-40, 20W-60, and 15W-40 oils, 2T Castrol oil, 2T Yamalube oil, SAE 50 oil, etc.

loans.name: Padilla Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Petrona es una mujer que tiene 56 años de edad, viuda con tres hijos mayores de edad, tiene 4 años de estar dedicándose a la venta de ropa usada, su hija mayor le ayuda a comercializar la ropa esta la vende a vecinos cercanos, ambulantes y a otros barrios donde la conocen que vende ese producto, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de pacas de sabanas variadas. Kleyvi tiene 20 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa usada también, Yamileth tiene 30 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en: This group has three enterprising members, one of whom is Petrona.  Petrona is 56 years old and a widow with three adult children.  For four years now, she has made a living selling used clothing.  Her oldest daughter helps her to sell the clothes to neighbours, in the streets and in other barrios where she is known for selling these products.  Petrona will invest the loan in buy various packs of sheets.  Kleyvi is 20 years old and also sells used clothes.  Yamileth is 30 years old and has a business selling new clothes.

loans.use: to buy packs of clothes and sheets.

loans.name: El Cueto Group

texts.es: Es un grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Mercedes tiene 30 años de edad soltera con una niña de 4 años de edad, su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace 7 años consecutivos y de ser cliente de  la institución tiene 4 años que a demostrado una buena cultura de pago son 8 créditos que lleva, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, pan, jabón de baño, jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de lavar trastos, papel higiénicos, cosméticos variados, carne de pollo, carne de res, sopa magis, perecederos etc. Con el crédito anterior su negocio mejoro en cuanto a la diversidad de productos que no contaba en el pasado por ejemplo venta de cosméticos. Luz  tienen 44 años de edad y su negocio es la de un Bar cafetín y venta de comida, y Juan tiene 55 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de aceite, venta de batería de vehículos, servicio y carga de batería.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising partners, one of whom is 30-year-old Mercedes.  She is single and has a four-year old daughter.  Mercedes' business is a small grocery store that she has been running out of her home for seven years.  She has been a member of the communal bank for four years, during which time she has shown herself to be reliable with her repayments.  She has had eight loans thus far.  Mercedes will invest this loan in buying basic goods such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, bread, soap, washing powder, toilet paper, make-up, chicken meat, red meat, soups and perishable goods.  With her previous loan Mercedes was able to diversify her product range, for example by introducing make-up in her store.  Luz is 44 years old and has a small café where she sells food.  Juan is 55 years old and his business is selling oil and selling, maintaining and charging batteries for vehicles.

loans.use: to buy basic goods such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, make-up, chicken meat, red meat, soups and perishable goods.

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.ru: Кароматулло 24-летний молодой человек. Он женат и у него одна маленькая дочь. Кароматулло со своей семьей живет у родителей в городе Вахдат. У него есть еще два младших брата. У Кароматулло высшее образование. Он уже год как работает фармацевтом и продает медикаменты. Его аптека находится в здании городской поликлиники. Кароматулло хочет увеличить товарооборот. С этим намерением он просит кредит для приобретения медикаментов в свою аптеку.
texts.en:
Karomatullo, aged 24, is a young married man and the father of a little girl.  He and his family live with his parents in the city of Vahdat.  He has two younger brothers.

Karomatullo has a college degree.  He has been working as a pharmacist for a year already, selling medicines.  His pharmacy is located in the same building as the town's polyclinic.

Karomatullo wants to increase his business.  With this goal in mind, he is requesting a loan to purchase medicines for his pharmacy.

loans.use: to purchase medicines.

loans.name: Eduardo Rafael

texts.es: Eduardo es un microempresario exitoso, es un hombre casado, con tres hijos menores de 2,4 y 7 años de edad, tiene 33 años y  su negocio es la de brindar servicio de cyber café, librería la cual tiene 9 años de estar con esa actividad, su esposa y el atienden el negocio. Con el crédito anterior adquirieron nuevos productos en la librerías, en el cyber compraron tres máquinas de computadoras nuevas, compro una fotocopiadora todo esto lo adquirió con las utilidades que le genera el negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra artículos de librerías como cuadernos universitarios grandes, cuadernos universitarios pequeños, lapiceros, lápiz de grafito, lápiz de colores, pegamentos, silicones, fomy, mapas mundi etc.
texts.en: Eduardo is a successful micro-businessman. He is a married man with three children, who are two, four, and seven years of age. He is 33 years old and his business is an internet café and bookstore, which he has had for nine years. He and his wife look after the business. With the previous loan they acquired new products for the bookstore, three new computers for the internet café, and a photocopier. They bought all of this with the earnings generated from the business. He will invest this loan in purchasing items for the bookstore, such as full-sized notebooks, pocket-sized notebooks, pens, graphite pencils, colored pencils, glue, industrial adhesive, craft foam, maps, etc.

loans.use: to purchase items for his bookstore, such as full-sized notebooks, pocket-sized notebooks, pens, graphite pencils, colored pencils, glue, industrial adhesive, craft foam, maps, etc

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria Magadalena nació en la ciudad de Calca pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación.  (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú). 

Maria Magadalena tiene 50 años de edad y es casada,  ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante su familia. Su actividad económica es la elaboración y venta de madera preparada, ella lleva sus productos a vender a la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena was born in the city of Calca but she lives in the city of Salvación. (The city of Salvación is located in the district and province of Manu, in the department of Madre de Dios, Peru).

Maria Magdalena is 50 years old and married. She is a hard-working and enterprising mother who helps her family to get ahead. She makes and sells wooden items. She takes her products to sell in the city of Cusco. She has been in this business for several years now and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. She belongs to the communal bank “Las Palmeras del Manu” and she needs the loan so she can purchase wood. She is grateful for the loan and she promises to make her monthly repayments.

loans.use: to purchase wood

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Santa Maria Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Santa Maria está en su primer ciclo, ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, son de la ciudad de Curuguaty, una ciudad un poco alejada, con difíciles medios de acceso a la comunicación. Las integrantes también luchan por mejorar su comunidad y que sus hijos tengan mejor seguridad.
Carla, una de las miembros, se dedica a las ventas, tiene un pequeño negocio, una despensa donde trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho sacrificio está creciendo y saliendo adelante. Carla quiere que su comunidad vaya creciendo y fortaleciéndose cada vez más.
Solicita este crédito para la compra de bebidas, carnes, comestibles, productos a granel y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo y dando a su clientela lo que necesita.
texts.en: The Santa Maria group is in its first cycle. They are learning to work together. They are from the city of Curuguaty, which is a bit remote and has difficulties with access to communications. The members also fight to improve their community and so that their children have more security. Carla, one of the members, is in sales. She has a small business, a despensa [small store], where she works every day beginning in the wee hours. She is a very hard-working person who, with much sacrifice, is growing and moving forward. Carla wants her community to keep growing and gaining strength. She is requesting this loan to buy drinks, meat, groceries, bulk products, and other items, so that she can continue growing and giving her customers what they need.

loans.use: to buy drinks, meat, groceries, bulk products, and more

loans.name: Corina

texts.es:
Corina es una mujer de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo, en el distrito de Jayanca con su esposo y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Corina no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus hijos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Corina trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Corina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de los servicios higiénicos de su vivienda, ya que las paredes de su baño están deterioradas y necesita construirlas con materiales adecuados y resistentes, de esta manera ella y su familia contarán con mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Corina is a 51 year-old woman who lives in the city of Chiclayo, in Jayanca district, with her husband and three children, who she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who, together with her husband, puts all of her efforts into moving her family forward. Unfortunately, because she lacked economic resources and needed to start working at a very young age in order to help her parents, Corina was unable to study for the professional accounting career she wanted. In her free time, she likes to play with her children and sometimes she prepares a rich loin stir-fry to share with her family.

On her own initiative, and with a great deal of effort and dedication, Corina works in her small business selling groceries and beverages. She works every day for approximately 10 hours, and thinks that it's doing well thanks to her good prices and the kind treatment she offers her customers.

Corina is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are offering, she will be able to make improvements to the bathroom in her home. The walls of her bathroom have deteriorated and she needs to construct them with adequate and sturdy materials, so that her family can enjoy greater safety and well-being and she can keep working and gaining strength, in order to achieve her greatest goal of finishing the construction of her home.

loans.use: to make improvements to the bathroom in her home

loans.name: Endang

texts.en:
Endang is a twenty-nine-year-old teacher, married to Feri, a thirty-one-year-old teacher. They are blessed with a baby girl – Fenda,  three months old. 

Endang uses her spare time cultivating vegetables, sweet potatoes and cassava in her backyard. Endang was thinking of starting a kiosk business selling daily needs like sugar, coffee, tea, etc.  She has requested a loan from TLM for IDR 5,000,000.

loans.use: to purchase items like sugar, coffee, tea, etc. for her kiosk.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy iron corrugated sheets, nails, cement, etc. to build a family home

loans.name: Mustapha B.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni city, northern Sierra Leone. We offer loans to teachers and other salaried workers  to empower them to buy or invest in things that their salaries cannot let them invest in. For example, some of these teachers can use the loan to buy a plot of land for the future construction of a family house, some will use it to buy pieces of furniture or pay school fees for their children. At the end of each month, their bursar repays SMT/Kiva on their behalf.

Mustapha is the featured leader of this group of teachers. Born in Pendembu, 52 years ago, Mustapha is married to a businesswoman and the couple has four children. Two of them are in primary school and the other two are in secondary school. Mustapha has requested a loan of 1,200,000 SLL in order to buy cement, iron rod and timber. 

(Also attached to the right of the photo is a borrower who was not present for the group snap shot)

loans.use: to buy cement, iron rod and timber.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Doña María, una madre de familia esforzada busca como salir adelante, hoy en día sus hijos son mayores e independientes lo que le da mucha alegría y satisfacción, siempre se apoya con su esposo en la venta de comida que ahora prepara por encargo para un proyecto de construcción y también vende en su casa. Solicita este crédito para invertir en su negocio de comida, esperando le ayude a mejorar su economía ya que los alimentos cada vez están más caros y tiene que buscar la manera de cómo equilibrar los gastos del hogar sin descuidar su negocio, el único medio de sustento.
texts.en:
María is a mother who struggles to find a way to get ahead.  Her children are now adults and independent which makes her very happy and satisfied.  With her husband's help, she sells food to a construction project on an order basis and also from her home.

She is requesting a loan to invest in her food business, hoping that this will improve her economy since food keeps getting more and more expensive.  She must find a way to balance her home expenses with her business, which is her only means of income.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, meats, seasonings, vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine is 36 years old. Lusine is married and lives with her two daughters in Vanadzor city. Her husband is in the Russian Federation working abroad. Lusine graduated from State Vanadzor Medical College. After graduating, she started working in Vanadzor hospital as a nurse. As her salary from the hospital is low, she decided to run her own business and started her clothes business. After her work in the hospital, Lusine sells women and children's clothes, which she buys from Yerevan clothes wholesale markets. She sells clothes from her house and she doesn't need any rental place in order to sell clothes. 

As Lusine confessed, without trading clothes, she couldn't sustain her family.  From time to time, her husband helps Lusine from Russia to meet his family's needs in Armenia. Lusine has been engaged in clothes trading for about three years and now she has a lot of clients in Vanadzor. Her clients are her neighbors, colleagues and patients from the Lori region.
 
Lusine has a big order from her clients and she needs a loan to buy women and children's clothes from Yerevan in order to resell them in Vanadzor. From this deal, she hopes to receive a good profit and to cooperate with Kiva again in the future.

loans.use: To buy women and children's clothes from Yerevan

loans.name: Pindoty 1 Group

texts.es:
El comité “Pindoty I” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad de la ciudad de Santaní, una ciudad mayormente rural, con poco acceso a ciertos medios de comunicación, la mayoría de las miembros de este grupo son de zonas bastante alejadas, donde es muy difícil poder acceder.
Todas las integrantes se dedican a actividades rurales, como ser cría y venta de animales de corral, como gallinas, cabras, y demás. Una de ellas es Evangelista, quien con mucho esfuerzo ayuda a su familia, se esfuerza por salir adelante y darles todo lo que necesitan.
Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, como ser maíz, afrecho, y demás, para poder dar una buena alimentación a sus animales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Pindoty I" was formed by several neighbors in the community of  Santaní, a mostly rural city with little access to certain types of communication.  Most of the members of the group live in remote areas that are difficult to get to.  All of them are involved in rural activities, such as raising and selling farm animals: chickens, goats, etc. 

One of the members is Evangelista who works hard to help her family.  She makes every effort to get ahead and give them everything they need.  She is requesting a loan to buy balanced animal feed such as corn, bran and other products to provide good nutrition for her animals.

loans.use: To buy corn, bran and other balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Satik

texts.en:
Satik is 53 years old. She lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and grandchild in Varser village, which is in the Sevan area. Satik has a higher education. She is an economist. Satik has worked in factories as a cashier and, since 1992, she has worked in Varser Village Municipality as an accountant and finance specialist.
 
At the same time, she has been engaged in a farming and agricultural business with her family. She grows in her garden vegetables, which her husband sells in Sevan fruit markets. Satik has a large animal barn and breeds cows and sheep. The main income in her family is from agriculture as salaries are too low in her region. Satik also has a large plot of land near Varser village. From this land, Satik takes fodder for her animals. Without any  mechanical tools it is very hard to mow the grass. So she needs a loan to buy a mowing machine, which Satik and her husband will use to mow grass and collect fodder for winter for her animals.

loans.use: To buy a mowing machine to mow grass and collect fodder for the winter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy tin sheeting and support beams.

loans.name: Aziz

texts.en:
Aziz is 57 years old, married, and a father of three children. He is raising cattle in order to sell the meat in the central bazaar. He, together with his wife, has been doing this business for 15 years. Currently he is retired and has a monthly pension of 150 AZN per month. This is insufficient to take care of his family’s financial needs, so that’s why he has dedicated himself to this business.

Aziz is selling his meat in the central bazaar to local butchers and the regular customers. Beef is in high demand in the region because it is used in everyday meals like kufta, bozbash, etc. Also during holidays people consume beef a lot, which helps him to earn more profits.

He has taken loan from Aqroinvest  two times previously and has a good loan history. His third loan is 1,800 AZN, and he plans to buy three calves with this money, to fatten them and then sell their meat. He is very optimistic about this loan, because of his familiarity with the details of the business he is doing.

loans.use: to buy three calves.

loans.name: Artsvik

texts.en:
Artsvik is 49 years old. She lives with her husband and son in Lchashen village, which is in the Sevan area. Artsvik graduated from Yerevan College of Commerce. She has worked as a salesperson, a tailor and a carpet master. 

For about 10 years, Artsvik has been engaged in animal breeding in her village. She breeds cows and pigs. Artsvik’s husband sells the meat and dairy products from animal breeding in Sevan regional food markets. The main income for Artsvik’s family comes from their agricultural business and animal breeding, because the salaries are too low in their region.  Artsvik is satisfied and happy that with their hard work on their farm, she can meet her family's needs. 

Artsvik decided to enlarge her animal breeding business. She is asking for a loan from Kiva to buy two piglets, two young cows and fodder for her animals.  She hopes to receive a good profit from this deal and hopes to cooperate with Kiva again in the future.

loans.use: To buy two piglets, two young cows and fodder for her animals

loans.name: Binh

texts.en:
Binh is 27 years old. She has two little children who are learning at primary school. Binh and her husband and do carpentry to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND. She has done this job for five years. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. She always wants to expand her business and raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Lumière De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LUMIÈRE DE DIEU est formé de trois personnes qui appartiennent à une même association des artisans. Le représentant de ce groupe, nommé Sohè Frédéric, est celui dont la main est levée sur la photo. Sohè Frédéric est marié à une revendeuse du nom de Célestine. Le couple a cinq enfants. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à sa charge. Certains parmi ces enfants sont scolarisés. Le couple vit ensemble avec leurs enfants. Sohè Frédéric et sa femme assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Pour ce faire, Sohè Frédéric exerce comme activité la couture dans son atelier. Dans le but de rehausser son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Sohè Frédéric et les membres du groupe LUMIÈRE DE DIEU sollicite pour une quatrième fois l'aide de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
LUMIÈRE DE DIEU Group is made up of three people who are members of the same artisans' association. The group's representative is named Sohè Frédéric. He is the one raising his hand in the photograph.

He is married to a reseller named Célestine. The couple has five children. In addition, they have another child in their care. They all live together. Some of the children go to school. The couple makes sure together that the household expenses gets covered.

To this effect, Sohè Frédéric works as a tailor in his workshop. In order to bolster his business and better meet his clientele's expectations, Sohè Frédéric, together with the other members of the group, is seeking financial support from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, for the fourth time. The previous loans were repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Katupyry está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas han visto una gran oportunidad de crecimiento para ellas y sus familias por medio de este programa. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, el cual es un medio que les ayuda a conocer la situación de cada una de las miembros.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cilvia, quien por medio de la venta de comidas ayuda a su familia. Ella es una persona muy buena en lo que hace, ya que sus comidas son muy sabrosas, y a sus clientes les gusta mucho.  Esta agradecida por la oportunidad que ella y su familia está recibiendo, ya que podrá seguir creciendo por medio de este comité.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para seguir haciendo los comestibles que vende, como ser carnes, verduras, condimentos, y demás, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir deleitando a sus clientes con sus delicias.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Kuña Katupyry" is in its first loan cycle through the women's program, which the members see as a great opportunity for them and their families.  They are in the process of taking the poverty elimination survey which is a way to determine each member's situation.

One of the members is Cilvia who sells food to help her family.  She is very good at what she does and her customers love her delicious cooking.  She is grateful for the opportunity she and her family are receiving, since she will be able to continue expanding through this group.

The loan she is requesting is to buy supplies required to make her food, such as meat, vegetables, condiments and other items.  This is so she can continue pleasing customers with her culinary delights.

loans.use: To buy meat, vegetables, condiments and other items.

loans.name: Seda

texts.en:
Seda is 56 years old. She is a widow and lives with her son in Lchashen village, which is in the Sevan area. Seda has a higher education. She is an aviarist (poultry) operator. For a long time, Seda has worked as a worker in many factories in the Sevan region but after Soviet Union collapsed, she became jobless. She had a hard and difficult life and after her husband died, she raised her son alone. 

Since 2004, Seda and her son have been running their own agricultural business. They are engaged in swine-breeding. Seda has built a large barn for pigs and breeds them in her village. They have 30 pigs. Seda says that swine-breeding is a very profitable branch of animal breeding but at the same time, very hard and difficult. As she confessed, you must just love your occupation and after that, it will bring you good profit. 

Seda asks from Kiva lenders a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams to buy a large amount of fodder for her pigs.

loans.use: To buy a large amount of fodder for her pigs

loans.name: Enkhbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Enkhbaatar, 49 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He has the position of a driver at a private business entity and he has already worked for two years. His main duty is to carry the chief executive officer to his destination. His wife works at a fuel station and his elder son is a second-year student at a university. His younger son goes to high school. The house the family lives in has deteriorated over the years and needs some serious repair. So, he is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam. As a result, the family can live in a warm and comfortable place. Also, the renovated house will enable the family to burn less coal, emit less smoke and contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong was born in 1958. She has four adult children who have their own families. Huong is a widow. She does carpentry to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND. She has done this job for one year. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle, she borrowed 5,152,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. She always wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Nga's Group

texts.en:
Nga is 27 years old. She has two children. Her son is little. Her daughter is learning at primary school. She and her husband do carpentry to earn a living. He earns about 7,000,000 VND, and Nga earns about 5,000,000 VND per month. She has done this job for three years. Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 VND per month. Her challenges in life and work are a lack capital to invest in her business and a lack of her product’s output. Her dream is for her children to grow up well and be successful in life. 

This loan will be one step toward helping her get to this dream. She can invest in her carpentry workshop to gain earnings and save profit for her children’s education. Nga is a hardworking and a passionate businesswoman. She has a passion of carpentry. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2013. 

In this first loan cycle, she would like to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. She always wants to expand her business and raise her children well.

Other members that are part of Nga's group include the following: 

Loan is 29 years old. She has three children. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. 
Hue is 25 years old. She has two children. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.
Vui is 26 years old. She has two children. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy a cutting machine for her carpentry workshop.
Chien is 20 years old. She has a child. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.
Nguyen is 50 years old. She has two children. She is a seller in a market. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for chickens.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is 34 years old. She has three children. Her 14-year-old son is a carpenter. The two others are learning in high school and primary school. Her husband is a construction worker. He earns about 4,500,000 VND per month. Thuy raises chickens to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND. She has done this job for six years. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,500,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. She always wants to expand her business and raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en:
Sara is 60 years old and married with four children. She raises sheep and sells them for meat. Sara has been doing this business for 21 years and is a very hard-working person. She puts a lot of effort in this activity, because she wants to support her family without lacking financially.

Sara is keeping a flock of sheep in her own yard. She fattens them and takes their meat to the central bazaar, where butchers and customers purchase this. People use mutton for traditional dishes like kababs, dolmas, pilovs, etc. 

She has taken loans and has a good loan history. This is going to be her second loan. This time she requires 1,900 AZN to purchase 15 sheep in order to sell more meat in summer. She is optimistic about this loan, because in summer more people consume meat, due to the holidays and increased customers in restaurants.

loans.use: to purchase 15 sheep in order to sell more meat in the summer.

loans.name: Sahrab

texts.en:
Sahrab is 42 years old, married, and has a daughter and a son. He raises cattle. He buys calves, fattens them and sells them as meat. Sahrab has been doing this business for 12 years now. He says it is a profitable business, which requires continuous effort. He wants to become a successful farmer in his town.

Currently, he sells beef in the central bazaar. Here he supplies meat to local butchers. In his town people consume a lot of meat, due to their traditional meals. Especially as this town is famous for its rich food like kebabs and dolmas.

Kamran had taken three loans from Aqroinvest previously. He is a successful customer. This time he requires a 1,800 AZN loan because he plans to purchase four calves in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase four calves in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Luchadoras II está en su primer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde tres de las quince señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, y están luchando para poder mejorar sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Andrea, quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, y con lo que se gana el sustento para dar a su familia lo que necesitan. Cuenta que gracias a que tiene muy buenos productos se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, lo cual la ayuda a tener mejores ingresos. Ella quiere seguir trabajando y luchando para crecer y asi seguir dando a su familia lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos de todas clases y marcas, para que así siga con sus ventas, pueda cumplir con los pedidos que tiene y también pueda seguir generando ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
This group, Mujeres Luchadoras II, is in its first cycle of the women committee program. All members are committed to work and to help each other in order to get ahead. They took part in the poverty elimination survey and three out of fifteen were found to be below the poverty line. They are fighting to improve their lives.

One of the group’s members is Andrea, who sells cosmetics. This is how she makes a living and gives her family what they need. She says that thanks to the good quality of the products she has, she has built a good customer base, which results in a better income. Andrea wants to continue working and fighting to grow and continue providing her family with everything they need.

Andrea is requesting a loan to buy all kinds and brands of cosmetics. This way, she will be able to continue selling, she will fulfill all the orders she has and she will continue generating an income for her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres luchadoras está en su primer ciclo, ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y a conocerse como equipo. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para conocer la situación de cada una de ellas, donde 2 de las miembros se encuentran con un ingreso muy bajo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Antonia, quien se encuentra dispuesta a trabajar y así, por medio de ese trabajo ir mejorando sus ingresos y la de su familia. Antonia se dedica a la venta de prendas de todas clases, tiene muy buena clientela, ya que siempre ofrece muy buenas prendas por un buen precio, y eso atrae a muchos clientes, su meta es poder seguir creciendo y ayudando a su familia con esos ingresos y a la vez cumplir con sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, ya que se acerca la época de frio y quiere poder ofrecer una buena variedad a sus clientes y tener también así mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Luchadoras is in its first cycle. They are learning to work together and know each other as a team. They are doing a project to eliminate poverty, and to get to know each of their situations. Two of the members have very low incomes.  

One of the members is Antonia. She is willing to work and via her work improve her income and her family's life. Antonia sells all types of clothing. She has  a good clientele because she always offers good clothing at a good price and this attracts a lot of customers. Her goal is to be able to keep growing and helping her family with this income, as well as to serve her customers. 

She is asking for this loan to buy winter clothing. The cold weather is coming and she wants to offer a good variety to her customers and also have better income.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing to sell.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila de 63 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir, tendidos y cubrelechos; actividad que desempeña  desde hace 20 años, cuando,  después de ser empleada de la industria textil, decidió con su liquidación,  invertir en un negocio de confecciones, emprendiendo así  su propia aventura, para generar ingresos independientes.  Hoy sus principales productos son los vestidos femeninos, los pantalones y el tejido de punto. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer finamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará telas e insumos, para confeccionar tendidos, pantalones y suéteres.  Lucila en su pequeño taller, desarrolla todas las operaciones de la confección, desde el diseño pasando por el corte,  la preparación de la prenda el ensamble y el acabado de ropas. Su meta es ampliar este negocio y ganar mas dinero, para mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia. Este propósito es el motor por el cual trabaja y se esmera diariamente con el fin de alcanzar su sueño de prosperidad.
texts.en: Lucila is 63 years old. She makes clothing, blankets and bedspreads. She has done this for 20 years. After working at a textile factory, she took her retirement package and invested in a sewing business, starting her own enterprise to generate independent income. Today her main products are women's dresses, pants and knitting. Right now she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has taken out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy fabrics and materials to make blankets, pants and sweaters. In her little workshop, Lucila does all kinds of sewing, from design to cutting, getting the item ready for assembly and finishing the product. Her goal is to expand this business and make more money to improve her family's living conditions. This goal is what drives her to work and strive every day to reach her dream of prosperity.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and materials.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Hace 30 años, por la necesidad de genera ingresos y para poder contribuir con los gastos de su familia, Celia una mujer de 56 años, se dedicó a la actividad comercial, vendiéndole calzado, vestidos a conocidos y familiares, para que estos, sus clientes, le pagaran poco a poco la totalidad del articulo. Su negocio gradualmente fue dando frutos y hoy tiene un punto comercial y necesita extenderse a otros mercados, con el fin de aumentar sus ventas, ahorrar y  más adelante tener un local propio y mas amplio. Celia vende de contado y a créditos de lunes a domingos, en un horario que se extiende desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde y recupera el dinero de sus cuentas por cobrar, semanalmente, y con este mismo dinero compra  de contado en el centro de la ciudad, donde encuentra descuentos especiales de acuerdo al volumen  de compras, lo cual sería mucho más efectivo si tuviera mucho más dinero para invertir. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa, calzado y otros artículos femeninos, con ello aumentarían sus recursos de compra, ofrecería mas artículos y así mismo sus ingresos se incrementarían y este es la razón de éxito de su creidikiva.
texts.en: 30 years ago, forced to generate an income and contribute to the family expenses, Celia, who is now 56, started selling footwear and dresses to friends and relatives who would pay for the items in instalments.  Her business gradually started to bear fruit and, although she now has a market stall, she needs to extend to other markets so as to increase her sales, make savings and eventually have a new and bigger shop of her own.  Celia sells her goods for cash or credit 7 days a week from 8am to 5pm and collects the money owed to her on a weekly basis.  She uses this money to make cash purchases in the town centre, where she qualifies for special volume discounts.  This would be far more effective if she had more money to invest.  It is for that very reason that she is applying to the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for her first Kiva loan.  She will use it to buy clothing, footwear and other items for women, increase her purchasing power, offer a wider range of goods and, as a result, boost her income.  This is how she intends to make successful use of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy clothing, footwear and other items for women

loans.name: Kuña Marangatu Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Marangatu está en su Séptimo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza con el que podrán conocer la situación de cada de cada una de las miembros, donde dos de las trece señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, con un ingreso muy bajo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ydalina , quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con un ingreso muy bajo. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa ella quiere  mejorar  su situación de pobreza, ella cuenta que tiene una despensa en su casa, y que solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa,  y de esa forma seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad a sus clientes, y además de eso estará invirtiendo en su plan de negocios.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Marangatu is on its seventh loan cycle of the women’s committee programme. They are carrying out the eliminate poverty survey which enables them to assess each member’s situation. Two of the thirteen women are under the poverty line, that is, two have a very low level of income.

One of the members is Ydalina. The survey showed that she is in level 1 of the poverty levels, that is, she has very low income. Through her efforts and continuous work and by employing the energetic actions of a successful woman, she wants to improve her situation. She explains that she has a grocery store in her home. She is requesting this loan in order to invest the money in the purchase of supplies for her store. In this way she can continue to offer a good range of products to her customers, which is a way to invest in her business plan.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her grocery store, such as foodstuffs, drinks, vegetables, rice and pasta, etc.

loans.name: Malvy Luz

texts.es:
Malvy Luz Sanabria.
Gracias por apoyar a Malvy quien con su creidikiva anterior compró productos de belleza como masajes, polvos, pinturas faciales, productos capilares, entre otros. Sus clientes se incrementaron porque pudo ofrecer mejores servicios ., Actualmente tiene un local  y su casa propia lo cual le produce mayor estabilidad y mucha satisfacción. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: "Mucha gracias y que me sigan ayudando para poder cumplir mis sueños" . En la actualidad está aplicando a un creidikiva con el cual comprará productos capilares para completar sus insumos y para el ejercicio de su actividad mercantil con la que complementa efectivamente sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Malvy Luz, who bought beauty products such as massages, powders, makeup and hair products with her previous loan. Her customers increased in number, because she was able to provide better services.

She currently has her own salon and her own home, which give her more stability and much satisfaction. This is her message to Kiva lenders: "Thank you very much and keep helping so I can fulfill my dreams". 

She is presently applying for a loan, with which she will buy hair products to increase her supply for her business, which will supplement her income.

loans.use: to purchase hair products

loans.name: Muzna

texts.en:
Muzna is a married woman with three sons and one daughter. She lives with her husband in a small village near Tulkarem. She owns a sewing workshop which is somewhat profitable, but she would like to improve her business. 

She is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing an additional sewing machine to provide better quality to her loyal customers. This will increase sales and improve her income.

Muzna appears in the photo in her workshop.

loans.use: to buy an additional sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the costs of completing his new home.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is 26  years old and a very hardworking gentleman. He learnt about KADET Lyd. from some of his regular customers who are registered members of KADET Ltd. 

He has successfully paid his first loan of KES 10,000 and now he is servicing a second loan of KES 40,000 as he has managed to enlarge his snack shop. He has also managed to acquire a motorcycle which gives him additional income from transportation.

He plans to enlarge and open other snack shops in town. His dream is to attain financial stability.

loans.use: to enlarge his snack shop.

loans.name: Wilson Rafael

texts.es: Wilson de 25 años de edad, habita en un barrio muy popular del municipio de Barranquilla, donde ofrece servicios  recreativos como video juegos, desde hace 5 años cuando aprendió de su tía, quien tenia el mismo negocio y él permanecía en su local jugando. Mediante la observación analizó el movimiento comercial de este negocio y su rentabilidad y con la ayuda de sus padres dio inició a su propia alternativa de negocios. Aumentándolo gradualmente mediante préstamos. Sus principales clientes son los niños y los jóvenes, a quienes atiende todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Sus principales proveedores de juegos,  son los centros comerciales especializados en tecnologías. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará videojuegos que modernizaran su oferta y un televisor. Con ello planea atraer a su clientela, preparándose para las vacaciones que ocurren a mitad del año y así su inversión de credikiva será exitosa, porque contribuye con la compra de los juegos más modernos del mercado, que son los que más gustan a sus jóvenes clientes. Su meta es continuar creciendo como empresario y  lograr estudios especializados, pero su gran desafío es tener suficientes recursos, para alcanzarlas de manera inmediata.
texts.en:
Wilson is twenty-five years old and lives in a popular neighborhood in the municipality of Barranquilla.  This is where he has offered his recreational services, like video games, for five years.  He learned this from his aunt, who had the same type of business; he would always spend time in her shop playing.  Through observation, he analyzed the commercial movement of this business and its profitability and, with the help of his parents, he started his own business.
