Con este crédito necesita cambiar el entechado que tiene varios orificios y con el invierno la pasarían muy mal si no se logra hacer dicho cambio, que solamente por medio de financiamiento puede realizar.
texts.en: Juana Paula is a woman struggling in life to cope and get ahead with her four children.  Two of her children are already working, which is a great support for her.  The two other children are still studying in university.  She does what she can, with her salary as a janitor the past few years, to look for a way not to miss the monthly school payments.  Ms Juana separated from her husband and now she alone looks after the welfare of the home and fights continually to improve the structure of the house.  With this loan she will replace the roof, which has various holes.  In the winter, they will have a tough time if they don't make this roof replacement, which is only possible through the financing of this loan.

loans.use: to buy corrugated steel and purlin wood frames to replace the roof of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy electronics and grocery stock such as maize, beans, rice and cooking fat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Delmy Noemy

texts.es: Delmy, tiene 32 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos con quienes vive en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Delmy lleva un año de tener su propio negocio de una pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios de consumo diario como ser: frijoles, maíz, manteca, refrescos, churros, sal, pan, condimentos, azúcar, carne de pollo etc. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo por 21,000 lempiras para surtir más el negocio de productos como azúcar, arroz, frijoles, manteca, pan, refrescos, churros, dulces etc. Tiene como meta hacer crecer el negocio y convertirlo en un supermercado.
texts.en:
Delmy is 32 years old, a single mother, and has two children with whom she lives in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. 

For a year, Delmy has had her own small general store where she sells daily household products such as beans, corn, lard, drinks, chips, salt, bread, condiments, sugar, chicken, etc. 

She has requested a loan of 21,000 lempiras so that she can further stock her store with products such as sugar, rice, beans, lard, bread, soft drinks, chips, candy, etc. Her goal is to make her business grow and convert it into a minimart.

loans.use: To further stock her business with products such as sugar, rice, beans, lard, bread, soft drinks, chips, candy, etc.

loans.name: Raisa

texts.ru:
Раиса уже несколько раз обращалась за финансовой помощью к КИВА. С момента получения предыдущего кредита от КИВА Раиса закрыла две свои точки и открыла одну новую в самом центре города. Она смогла это сделать за счет скопленных от ведения бизнеса средств.  
В этот раз ей понадобилась сумма в размере 24 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить новый вид продуктов-купальников и пополнить ассортимент в новой торговой точке. За счет расширения предложенной продукции Раиса сможет увеличить круг покупателей и соответственно поднять свой доход.
texts.en:
Raisa has repeatedly turned to Kiva for financial help. On receipt of the previous loan from Kiva, Raisa closed two of her retail spots and opened one new one in the heart of the city. She was able to do it at the expense of accumulated funds from the business. 
 
This time, she needed a sum of 24,000 hryvnia to purchase a new kind of swimwear products and to fill the new outlet. By expanding her product offering, Raisa will be able to increase the number of buyers and thus raise her income.

loans.use: to purchase a new kind of swimwear products and to fill the assortment in the new retail outlet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for his crafts business.

loans.name: Teresa Benita

texts.es: Doña Teresa es una señora trabajadora y emprendedora, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, actualmente se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo ya que es un negocio que le da como resultado buenas ganancias y que es muy buscado por sus vecino ya que es un producto de primera necesidad para todos diariamente y es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, Doña teresa solicita un prestamo para la compra de maíz por mayor para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica con su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is a hard-working and enterprising woman who lives in her own house with her husband and their children. Currently she sells tortillas from her home, and has been doing this for several years.

She works from Monday to Sunday, as it is a business that provides her with good earnings and which is very popular with her neighbors. This is because the product is a daily household necessity for everyone, and she is a very hard-working and friendly person. 

Teresa is requesting a loan to buy corn at wholesale, so that she can continue making her tortillas. This way she can earn more, so that she and her family can have better financial stability.

loans.use: To buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Natasha

texts.ru: Наталия в очередной раз обратилась за помощью к КИВА. В этот раз Наталия планирует вложить сумму в 5 000 гривен в закупку сумок, ремней, за счет чего надеется увеличить и разнообразить свой ассортимент. Наталия не любит останавливаться на достигнутом, постоянно стремится двигаться дальше, поднимаясь на новый уровень развития своего бизнеса, тем самым также улучшая жизнь своей семьи.
texts.en: Nataliya has once again turned to Kiva for help. This time Nataliya plans to invest an amount of 5,000 hryvnia to buy bags and belts, thereby hoping to increase and diversify her product range. Nataliya does not like to stop there, constantly striving to move further, rising to a new level of development for her business, thus also improving the life of her family.

loans.use: to buy bags and belts

loans.name: Ndinda

texts.en: The business at Ndinda's grocery stall has increased and she has been able to meet a number of bills thanks to the improved patronage. Ndinda would like to purchase other household goods but is now requesting a loan of 2,650 Kenya shillings to buy a modern charcoal stove. This will improve their immediate environment because it emits less smoke.

loans.use: To buy a modern charcoal stove.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés, de 48 años de edad , esta casado con Betty, juntos tienen 3 hijos con quienes viven en su casa propia.  Moises se dedica a la agricultura, todos los dias cuida de sus cultivos de papa, avena y olluco (productos agrícolas) que siembran en sus 2 hectáreas de terrenos productivos y otras tantas que alquila en temporadas, ya tienen 21 años dedicándose a ello y juntos hacen posible para mandar el dinero suficiente a sus hijos. Moises desea comprar otra casa, donde planean poner una tienda de comestibles y alquilar cuartos.Éste es el cuarto crédito con KIVA, y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo finaciero brindado razón por la cual se compromete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Moisés invertirá los S/.2000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en: Moises, 48, and his wife, Betty, have 3 children, all of whom live at home.  Moises operates a farming business.  He grows potatoes, beans and olluco on 2 hectares of farmland than he owns and additional land that he leases.  He has farmed this way for 21 years and he and his wife have done everything they can to provide for their children.  Moises wants to buy another house where he will set up a grocery and rent rooms.  This will be his fourth KIVA loan and he says that he is very grateful for the support that he's had from past loans.  He is committed to repaying this loan on time.  Moises will use your S/.2000 soles loan to buy organic manure to prepare his land for his next crop.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Maria Berta

texts.es: Doña maria vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce y pan frances y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde ella reside. Doña Maria solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas para hornear y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her two children in their own house. She is a very responsible, hard-working and honest woman. She works in her own bakery where she makes sweetbreads and French breads, and goes out to sell them around the neighborhood where she lives. 

Maria is requesting a loan so that she can purchase flour, lard, baking containers, and everything necessary so that she can produce more baked goods. This improvement project for her bakery is very important for her, as this way she will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy flour, yeast, baking containers, etc.

loans.name: Tariq

texts.en:
Tariq owns a small dairy farm in the area of Lahore, Pakistan, which is the only source of income for his family. He has three buffaloes, which is insufficient to earn a good amount of income and sustain the lives of his family. Therefore he wishes to purchase two more animals so that he can get more milk to sell and earn a good amount of income.

Tariq has requested a loan amount of 100,000 Pakistani Rupees (PKR) from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase cattle for his business. He does not want his children to spend their lives as he did.  Therefore he wants to provide quality education to his children so they can lead respectable and good lives in the future. He is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for his dairy farm business.

loans.name: Abiana

texts.es: Abiana, tiene la edad  de 30 años, está casada,  vive con sus dos hijos y el esposo actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar mercadería para su posterior venta. Ella tiene pensado comprar  mercadería al mayoreo para que le sea más cómodo y obtener más ganancias y poder vender la mercancía en el mercado de la localidad y alrededores,  para obtener buenas ganancias y una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Abiana is 30 years old and is married. She lives with her two children and her husband. She plans to use the loan to buy merchandise which she will resell. She has thought about buying merchandise at wholesale so that she has a better profit margin and so that she can sell her goods in the local market as well as nearby areas. This will allow her to have good profits and improve her economic stability and quality of life. 

This is the first loan she has received through FUDECOSUR. She has never taken out loans with other financial institutions, but FUDECOSUR provides loans with an easier application process and an interest rate that is much lower than other institutions.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Wuendi Yumila

texts.es: Wuendi, tiene 34 años de edad, es casada, vive con su conyugue en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Hace 4 años que ella se dedica al comercio, su negocio es venta ambulante de ropa como blusas, camisas, pantalones, ropa intima para damas, caballeros  y niños. Ha decidido solicitar un tercer préstamo que es por 10,000 Lempiras para surtir de ropa y otra mercadería que le pidan los clientes. Va comprar ropa usada para la venta como pantalones, camisetas, blusas, ropa intima para damas y ropa de niños. Tiene como fin crecer con el negocio para poderles dar un mejor futuro a su familia y tener mejor condición de vida.
texts.en: Wuendi is 34 years old, married, and lives with her spouse in the municipality of Azacualpa, in the department of Santa Bárbara. She has been working for four years now selling clothing from door-to-door and place-to-place. She sells clothing such as blouses, shirts, pants and underwear for women, men and children. She is requesting a third loan of 10,000 HNL to stock her business with clothing and other merchandise that her customers request. She buys secondhand clothing to sell, such as pants, shirts, blouses, women’s undergarments and children’s clothing. Her goal is to grow her business to improve her family’s future and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing to sell, such as pants, T-shirts, blouses, women’s undergarments and children’s clothing.

loans.name: Alamar

texts.es: Alamar  tiene  56  años de edad, esta casado y vive con la esposa  actualmente. El con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. El piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, el no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ni dichos contratos, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Alamar is 56 years old, married and lives with his wife. With the loan, he intends to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pest-control sprays, and at the same time hire laborers to help him. 

He plans to maintain his plantings so that they won't suffer any damage, and production won't be lost. This way, with his coffee-growing project he will be able to generate more income to contribute to his family. 

He doesn't have the necessary capital for this purchase nor for this hiring, as he is a low-income person and does not have the means to acquire the  money necessary for this. So he applied for a loan. This is the first loan he has received from Fudecosur. He had not had other loans before from regular banks, but Fudecosur has offered him a loan with better terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a 53-year-old mother from Kisumu City. She is married to Javan, who is a business man. They have three children who are grown; they are 28, 26, and 22 years old, respectively.

Fridah has a poultry farm where she keeps chickens of different varieties. She has been doing this business for the last 20 years and makes a monthly income of 51,100 Kenyan Shillings (KES). She is applying for her fifth loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to pay school fees for her child who is in college and also buy poultry feed.

Fridah is hoping to run a successful business.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her child and also buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Hosanna Jabneel

texts.es:
La Sra. Hosanna es originaria de la cd. de Frontera, Coah. pero tiene viviendo en Piedras Negras desde hace 29 años, prácticamente toda su vida, es una persona responsable es casada y madre de un niño de 8 años, es empleada en una farmacia desde hace 5 años, tiene el puesto de encargada de ese lugar, su esposo trabaja de trailero desde hace varios meses, ella junto a su esposo han sabido salir adelante juntos, se apoyan en todo momento, siempre viendo por el bienestar de su hijo.
Pide apoyo a través de KIVA para realizar cambios en su cocina, quisiera hacer acabados interiores al igual que cerrar una puerta para así tener más espacio, ya que su cocina es un poco pequeña y tiene la necesidad de tener más espacio, poco  a poco irá ampliando su hogar, para en un futuro dejarse a su hijo con muy buenas mejoras terminadas.
texts.en:
Sra. Hosanna was born in the Mexican city of Frontera in Coahuila, but she has lived in Piedras Negras for 29 years, almost her whole life.  She is a responsible woman, a wife and the mother of an 8-year old boy.  She has worked in a pharmacy for 5 year and is the manager there now.  Her husband has worked as a "trailero" [don't know--Spanglish for a trucker, perhaps?] for several months.  She and her husband have learned what it takes to get ahead and they have supported each other through thick and thin, always with the idea of what is best for their son.  
Sra. Hosanna is applying to KIVA for a loan that she will use to make improvements to her kitchen.  She wants to create a larger space to work because her kitchen is a bit small and she needs more space.  She has been expanding the house, little by little, to create a better home for her son.

loans.use: to finish house improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy embroidery materials for her embroidery business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene la edad de 40 años, es divorciada y tiene dos hijos. Ella el crédito lo quiere para la compra de ganado de cría y cuando estén grandes venderlos y obtener una ganancia. El negocio del ganado le ayudará a ella y a su familia a salir adelante. Es la primera vez que María se financia con FUDECOSUR, ella manifiesta que el comité de crédito le ha ayudado mucho y le ha brindaron muchas facilidades. Ella espera que con este proyecto crezca y logre sus objetivos y así pueda en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: María is 40 years old, divorced with two children.  She wants a loan for the purchase of livestock for breeding, as they are great to sell and make a profit. The cattle business will help her and her family to get ahead. It is the first time that María is to be financed by FUDECOSUR.  She mentioned that the credit committee has been very helpful to facilitate the loan. She hopes that this project will achieve its objectives and grow in the future, in order to give her family a better quality of life and improved economic stability.  This is her first loan received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had other loans in state banks but FUDECOSUR has provided the loan with a much lower interest rated and better terms.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Saidmurod

texts.ru: Саидмуроду 40 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 11 лет назад он начал свой бизнес куплей продажей женской одежды. Его эффективность помогает ему быть успешным в бизнесе. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. У него тонкий вкус и он умеет выбрать товар, который имеет большой спрос. Несмотря на все его достоинства, мощная конкуренция  делового мира, заставляет его быть внимательным и обновлять товар каждый сезон. Он должен купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  8000 сомони для покупки товара для нового сезона. Он ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en:
Saidmurod is 40 years old. He is married and is raising two children. In order to provide the family with all the necessary facilities, 11 years ago he started his own business buying and selling women's clothing. His efficiency helps him to be successful in his business. He sells his goods on the local market and has a large number of customers. He has good taste and knows how to choose products that have great demand. 

Despite all his advantages, the powerful competition of the business world forces him to be considerate and to update items every season. He has to buy goods for the new season, but does not have the sufficient means to do so. He is asking for a loan of 8,000 somoni to buy goods for the new season. He is awaiting the kindness and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes for the new season

loans.name: Jovita

texts.es: Jovita, tiene 36 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, hace tres años que empezó a vender ropa como blusas, camisas, calcetines, y ropa intima para damas y caballeros. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante en su comunidad y alrededores. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 15,000 lempiras para comprar más mercadería y ofrecer a sus clientes. Va comprar ropa variada para damas, caballeros y ropa interior. Su sueño es incrementar las ventas y las ganancias para darle calidad de vida a su familia y tambien poder construir un local para establecer el negocio.
texts.en: Jovita is 36 years old, married and has two children. She lives in a village in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Barbara. She has always worked as a merchant.  As of three years ago, she started selling clothes such as blouses, shirts, socks and underwear for ladies and gentlemen.  She makes her sales as a mobile street vendor in her community and nearby.  She is requesting a loan of 15,000 Lempiras to buy more goods to offer to her customers. She will buy various clothes for both men and women, as well as underwear.  Her dream is to increase sales and profits to give her family a better quality of life and also to build a permanent stand to stabilize her business.

loans.use: to buy various clothing for both men and women, as well as underwear.

loans.name: Batmonh

texts.en:
Mr.Batmonh is a 31-year-old single man who lives in ger in the Uvs province of Mongolia. He has lot of experience, starting when he was little, in the agriculture and organic vegetable/fruit growing business. His siblings all are operating similar businesses; they help each other and share equipment and machines. 

He started his organic vegetable growing business in 2011. He also runs an inter-city transportation service business during the off-season. 

He is now requesting 7,000,000MNT to purchase a plot of land and seeds to plant organic vegetables, and grow fruit trees for plantation season. 

He is a hardworking, enthusiastic, and diligent man.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land and seeds to plant organic vegetables and grow fruit trees for plantation season.

loans.name: Kevin

texts.en:
Kevin, a 39-year-old farmer, is married to Sarlince, 34. They are blessed with four children: Daniel,13, and Daud,11, are in elementary school. Yendrit, 5, is in kindergarten, and Marselus is 4.

To make a living, Kevin cultivates cassava and sweet potato at his farm. In addition, he is raising pigs and cattle. 

Kevin has planned to buy more piglets to raise, and a used motorcycle for ojek (motor taxi transportation).  He has requested a loan of IDR 10,000,000 from TLM.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, and a used motorcycle for ojek (motor taxi transportation).

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan is 57 years old. She has four adult children who are workers, beverage sellers and engineers. She and her husband grow vegetables to earn a living. He earns about 2,500,000 Vietnamese Dong (VND) per month. Lan’s income is about 3,000,000 VND. She has done this job for eight years. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND (or about 476 US dollars) per month. 

Lan has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow vegetables. She is always hoping to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka, aged 50 years, is married and has four school-going children. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past five years, she has operated a grocery business, selling at the market to passersby and people who live nearby. Mwaka cites seasonality as her major challenge. She dreams of expanding by establishing a restaurant in the future.

With the 30,000 Kenyan Shillings she is requesting, she wants to purchase sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Nga's Group

texts.en:
Nga is 35 years old. She has three children, who are learning in the first grade, the fifth grade and the eighth grade. Her husband is a construction material driver. His income is 6,000,000 VND per month. Nga raises chickens and works as an assistant for her husband, to earn a living.  She earns about 3,000,000 VND per month. She has done this work for ten years. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In the previous loan cycle she borrowed 5,152,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 7,392,000 VND to buy food for pigs. She always wants to expand the pigsty and to raise her children up well.

Other members who are part of Nga's group include the following: 

  Hong is 20 years old. She wants to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. 
  Ha is 29 years old. She wants to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. 
  Pha is 38 years old. She wants to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. 
  Oanh is 37 years old. She wants to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. 
  Loan is 25 years old. She wants to borrow 6,496,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to buy food for pigs.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 26 years old and lives at Nyamasaria, in Kisumu. She is a single mother of two children, who are twins and five years old. She has a retail shop within her area of residence, which she has been operating for the past one year. She earns a monthly income of KES 30,000.

She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use it to purchase goods in bulk to resell at her shop, like sugar, wheat flour, cooking oil and bar soap. She will use the anticipated profit to grow the current business. She has a dream of opening a wholesale in town, and a goal to take care of her children.

loans.use: To purchase goods to resell, like sugar, wheat flour, cooking oil and bar soap

loans.name: Aleksi

texts.en:
Aleksi is 38 years old. He lives in Balichi village, Bolnisi district, with his 29-year-old wife Nino and retired father. Aleksi requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected all the time because of low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

The main source of the income for the family is from agricultural activities. In particular, they have a plot of land where potatoes, maize, and haricot are grown. Also, the family owns a milk cow, which is milked every day to make dairy products. All the products are sold together at the local markets. Family additional income is Aleksi’s father's monthly pension.  

Aleksi requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With his credit, Aleksi will purchase grocery stock to open a grocery shop. His family will be selling the products from the shop themselves so they don’t have to have the extra expense of paying a salary to the seller. This will significantly increase their profit. He will be reinvesting part of the profit into purchasing more grocery stock in order to have better choices to offer to the clients. The other part, Aleksi will use for covering family monthly expenses and providing better living conditions for them.

loans.use: To purchase grocery stock to open a grocery shop

loans.name: Altanshagai

texts.en:
Mr. Altanshagai is 26 years old and lives with his wife, Uurintuya, and two-year-old son, Togsbileg, in an apartment in the Dornogovi province of Mongolia. He used to help his father to run a transportation service business, back and forth between the province and the province center. He has gained a lot of experience in long-distance driving with his father.

He has married and moved out of his parents' house, and now he is starting his own business providing transportation services, inter-city, to cover his family's living expenses. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT. He will use the loan to purchase wheels and tires for his mini-van, with which he will provide inter-city, passenger transportation services. He is a hardworking, neat and responsible man.

loans.use: to purchase wheels and tires for his mini-van, which he will use to provide transportation services

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадине 33 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 6 лет назад она начала свой бизнес куплей продажей риса на местном рынке. Она имеет своих постоянных клиентов на местном рынке и старается удовлетворить потребность своих клиентов. Ее клиенты, как местные жители, так и владельцы кафе, которые приготавливают и продают национальную еду "плов". Ее клиенты довольны ею, так как у нее высококачественный товар. Она является основной кормилицей в семье, так как ее муж простой рабочий и зарабатывает мало денег. Уже несколько лет она планирует купить мебель для своей комнаты, но не может делать сбережения, так как все свои деньги она тратит для покупки не обходимых средств. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 Cомони для покупки мебели. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Madina is 33 years old. She is married with three children. In order to provide the family with all the necessary means, she started a business six years ago buying and selling rice in the local market. She has regular customers in the local market and is trying to meet the needs of her customers. Her customers are locals and cafe owners who prepare and sell national "pilaf" dishes. Her customers are pleased with her because she has a high-quality product. 

She is the main breadwinner for the family, as her husband is a simple work and earns little money. For several years, she has been planning to buy furniture for her rooms, but she is not able to save because she spends all her money buying the necessities. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 Somoni (TJS) to buy furniture.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her household

loans.name: Liana

texts.en: Liana is 41 years old. She lives alone in Zerti village, Gori district. Liana applied for loans from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. Her loan applications were rejected all the time, because of her low income and poor living conditions. Liana owns a small plot of land. She grows vegetables and sells them at the local markets to earn a small monthly income, which is her only source of income. Liana has applied for a loan from Credo to start up a family business. Liana has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits on soft conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With her credit, Liana will start trading in clothes. She owns a small commercial space which will be used as a shop. Liana will buy men’s and women’s clothes from the big market at wholesale prices and sell them in her shop with a price markup. This will give her an opportunity to earn a better income and develop a new business. With the increased income, Liana will be able to provide better living conditions for herself.

loans.use: to start trading in clothes by buying wholesale and selling in her shop with a markup.

loans.name: John Baptist

texts.en:
John Baptist is a permanent resident of Katembe in the Isingiro district; he is married with nine children. 

John Baptist is a farmer with banana plantations. The plantations give him a fairly good source of income, because the market is quite large. Bananas (matooke) are a staple food for most people in the western part of the country where John Baptist has his farm. So he sells to both locals and traders who come from the city. 

His hard work has not been in vain, because from the fruit of his labor, he has managed to save and to buy land as well as to support his family and dependents. 

John Baptist is constructing a house on his newly acquired land, and is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 UGX to complete it.

loans.use: To complete his house.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine lives in the Mombasa area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is married and has one child. She owns a grocery shop, a business which has been running for two years. Her husband is formally employed.

Josephine learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group, and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenges are inflation and the high cost of transport.

Josephine is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy grocery stock, e.g. maize, beans, rice and cooking fat. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve the living standard of her family and pay school fees for her child. She aspires to open a mini-wholesale operation.

loans.use: To buy grocery stock, e.g. maize, beans, rice and cooking fat.

loans.name: Haind

texts.en: Haind is a 32-year-old married woman who has two children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. All her life she has been working hard and earning money to assist her husband to provide for their family. She is a kind woman who works as an employer in the Water & Environment Ministry making a low salary. Her salary is not enough to cover household expenses. She is requesting a loan of 199,999 YER to buy home appliances and furniture to use for her house. She hopes to improve her living standards and enroll her children to private school.

loans.use: to buy home appliances and furniture to use for her house.

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru: Халима в нашей организации кредитуется первый раз. Она добросовестная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в  сельской  местности. Она  работает  в  школе  преподавателем.  Муж  занят  услугой  тракториста.   Её  сыновья работают строителями, и полученный доход используют для содержания семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Халима получает маленькую зарплату и надеется на доход мужа, так как они имеют 4 детей. Содержание 4 детей очень трудно, хотя ее сыновья тоже работают. Недавно трактор ее мужа сломался, и он данное время остался без работы. Халима хочет помочь мужу для ремонта трактора, так как ее муж данное время не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1050 долларов США для ремонта трактора мужа. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Halima is asking for a loan for the first time. She is a conscientious and hard-working woman. She was born in the countryside. She works as a schoolteacher. Her husband provides tractor services. Her sons work in construction and the income is used to support the family with the necessities. Halima receives a small salary and looks forward to her husband's income, as they have four children. Caring for four children is very difficult, even though her sons are also working. 

Recently, her husband's tractor broke down and he was left without work. Halima wants to help her husband to repair the tractor because her husband does not currently have the money. She is asking for a loan of US$1,050 for repairs to her husband's tractor.

loans.use: to repair her husband's tractor which is the main source of his income

loans.name: Salomon

texts.es: Salomón, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 47 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa y dos hijos  actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Salomón is an entrepreneur. He is a 47-year old married man who lives with his wife and two children. He has requested a loan with an aim to buy supplies such as fertilizer and pesticides. He is willing to assist in the coffee plantations so that they are kept in good condition and they provide a good quality product. His only limitation is the lack of financial capacity to keep growing, as they depend on this activity to get ahead. 

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans in national banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better conditions and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es:
“El éxito consiste en ir de fracaso en fracaso y no desanimarse” esta es la frase preferida de John de 41 años de edad, que después de laborar por más de 20 años en una empresa de salud, decide retirarse y crear su propio negocio, en el cual fracasa meses después. Asegura que esto no ha sido una barrera para seguir soñando y que por el contrario hoy se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el fin de capacitarse en la elaboración de comida express, para volver a restaurar su plan de negocios. 
Manifiesta que una de las lecciones aprendidas es que la suerte no es más que el conocimiento unido a una buena oportunidad.
Su hijo de ocho años de edad se ha convertido en su mayor aliciente y en la fuerza que lo impulsa en búsqueda de un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
“Success consists in going from failure to failure without becoming discouraged.”  This is John’s favorite saying.  He’s 41-years-old and after having worked for a health firm for over 20 years he  decided to retire and start his own business which failed within a few months.  

He insists that this has not been a barrier for him to continue dreaming and that on the contrary, today he’s seeking a loan in order to be trained in fast-food so he can restart his business plan.  He states that one of the lessons learned is that luck is nothing more than knowledge united to a good opportunity.  

His 8-year-old son has become his greatest source of encouragement and strength that pushes him to seek a better future.

loans.use: to get fast-food training.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, blocks, and sand.

loans.name: Dzame

texts.en:
Dzame, a 24-year-old married mother of five school-going children, lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Dzame operates a grocery shop, selling to market dwellers and passersby. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. With this Kshs 30,000 loan, Dzame will purchase sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes and onions

loans.name: Johan David

texts.es:
Johan, es un joven dedicado a laborar en oficios varios desde hace algunos años. Actualmente reside con su madre y es el encargado se abastecer las necesidades básicas del hogar. 
Con el fin de mejorar su condición económica y garantizarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, Johan se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de capacitarse en la elaboración de productos a base de quesos y calados, conocimiento que le permitirá independizarse y crear su propio negocio en el mediano plazo. 
Su mayor deseo es brindarle a su madre una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Johan has been working in various trades for a few years now. He currently lives with his mother and is in charge of supplying their home with the basic necessities.

His goal is to improve his economic situation and guarantee his family better living conditions. For this reason Johan is requesting a loan to pay for training in the preparation of products made from cheese and calado [a syrop used for desserts]. This training would allow him to become independent and start his own business in the medium-term. His greatest wish is to provide his mother with her own home.

loans.use: to pay for training in the preparation of products made from cheese and calado [a syrup used for desserts].

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es: Jhon Jairo de 43 años de edad, labora como independiente desde hace más de 6 años en una tienda de productos generales, actividad que con la que genera los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Con el fin de diversificar sus productos y aumentar su nivel de ventas, se encuentra solicitando un crédito para capacitarse en la elaboración de productos a base de quesos y calados. Espera que con dicha inversión pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y garantizarles a sus dos hijos menores de edad una educación de calidad.
texts.en: Jhon Jairo, 43, has worked independently for more than six years in a general store, an activity with which he generates income to support his family.  In order to diversify his products and increase the level of sales, he’s asking for a loan to train in the field of making products based on cheese and sugar syrup.  He hopes that with said investment he will be able to improve his family’s quality of life and guarantee a better quality education for his two minor children.

loans.use: to get food-preparation training.

loans.name: Kelly Johana

texts.es:
Kelly, es una joven emprendedora de 23 años de edad. Actualmente labora en una empresa del sector comercial, pero debido a las humillaciones y maltrato verbal  de los que ha sido víctima, desea independizarse y en conjunto con su hermano quien es estudiante, crear su propia empresa con el fin de comenzar a construir un mejor futuro para ellos y su familia.
Se encuentran solicitando un crédito que invertirán en asesoría especializada para creación de empresa y en diseño y publicidad con el objeto de tener unas bases sólidas que le permitan ser competente y ser perdurable en el tiempo. 
Su mayor deseo es convertirse en una microempresaria de éxito y tener grandes oportunidades de crecer dentro del mercado local.
texts.en:
Kelly is a young 23 year old entrepreneur.  She currently works at a business in the commercial sector, but due to the humiliation and verbal abuse she has suffered, she wants to become independent.  Together with her brother, who is a student, she wants to start her own business with the goal of starting to build a better future for them and their family.

She is requesting this loan to invest in specialized advice to start a business and for design and publicity in order to have a solid base that will allow them to be competent and endure over time.

Her main hope is to become a successful small business owner and have great opportunities to grow within the local market.

loans.use: to get specialized advice to start a business, and for design and publicity.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Doña Blanca tiene 62 años, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara junto a dos de sus hijos. Doña Blanca siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, lleva 8 años de dedicarse a la venta de mercadería como camisas, sandalias, calcetas y ropa intima para damas y caballeros. Ella sale a vender a la comunidad y a las aldeas de alrededor. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo a ODEF, el cual es por 12,000 Lempiras para surtir más su negocio, va comprar pantalones, ropa intima, camisetas etc. para poder vender más y obtener mejor ganancia. Su plan es hacer un local para el negocio y dejarles a sus hijos una fuente de trabajo.
texts.en:
Blanca is 62, a single mother, and has three children. She lives in a village in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara, with two of her children. Blanca has always been a businessperson. For eight years she has been selling merchandise such as shirts, sandals, stockings and underwear for men and women. 

She goes out to sell to the community and to the surrounding villages. She is applying for a second loan from ODEF which is for 12,000 lempiras, so that she can further stock her business. She is going to buy pants, underwear, T-shirts, etc., so that she can sell more and obtain better profit. Her plan is to set up a shop for her business and leave her children a source of work.

loans.use: To buy pants, underwear, T-shirts, etc. to stock her business.

loans.name: Zacharie

texts.en: Zacharie, 47, is from Gatsibo District, in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. He is seeking a loan of  RWF 60,000 to purchase 20 rechargeable LED lights, which he will resell to people in his village who are without electricity. Every week or so, these customers will return to him, to have their lights recharged for just RWF 100.  He is also a farmer and will reinvest the money he makes into expanding his other business, to earn more money for himself and his wife.

loans.use: To pay for 20 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households that are without electricity.

loans.name: Harriete

texts.en: Harriete is a 32-year-old woman from Gatsibo District, in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. She is seeking a loan of RWF 60,000 to purchase 20 rechargeable LED lights, which she will resell to people in her village who are without electricity. Every week or so, these customers will return to her, to have their lights recharged for just RWF 100.  She is also a farmer and will reinvest the money she makes into expanding her other business, to earn more money for herself and her husband .

loans.use: To pay for 20 low-cost LED lights, which she will resell to rural households that are without electricity.

loans.name: Jose Valeriano

texts.es: Don José de la edad de 48 años vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, es una persona trabajadora, honeto y honrado, actualmente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años su principal siembra es el maíz, fríjol, tambie cosecha tomate, chile, rábano y una pequeña parte de café. Don jose solicita un credito para la compra de semilla, fertilizante, abonos, herbicidas asi como muestra la fotografia que son de debida importancia para su cosecha y asi el producira buenos frutos que le dejatran mejores ganancias y le podra dar una mejor estabilidad economica a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 48, lives in his own house with his wife and son; he’s a hardworking, honest and honorable man.  He’s been working in agriculture for 20 years; his main crops are corn and beans but he also grows tomatoes, chilies, radishes and a small crop of coffee.  

José is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure and herbicide which, as shown in the photo, are of great importance for his crops.  In this way he will produce good fruit that will yield higher profits and he will be able thus to provide better economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo  tiene  58  años de edad, esta casado y vive con la esposa y tres hijos  actualmente. El con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. El piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, el no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Alfredo’s 58-years-old, married and living with his wife and three children at present.  He intends to use the loan to buy supplies like fumigation and also to help pay for labor costs.  He aims to provide maintenance for his plants so that they will not suffer any damage and production will not be lost.  In this way, his coffee growing project will be able to generate higher profits to contribute to his family.

He does not have the capital needed for said purchase because his resources are limited and he has no way of getting the money needed for this.  This is why he requested a loan, the first one he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur has provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to fumigate his coffee plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to learn basic cooking skills

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, and other supplies for her coffee crops

loans.name: Lucelly

texts.es:
Lucelly de 39 años, es madre cabeza de familia de dos hijos menores de edad. Con el fin de generar el sustento y la educación de sus hijos, esta mujer labora en una casa de familia  como niñera. En la actualidad desea capacitarse en la creación de su propio negocio, con el fin de dedicar más tiempo a su familia. Motivo que la ha impulsado ha solicitar un crédito ya que no cuenta con recursos propios para realizar dicha inversión.
Su mayor deseo es tener su propio negocio y mejorar la condición económica y la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lucelly is 39, and the parent of two minor children. In order to pay for the support and education of her children, this woman works at a family home as a nanny. 

Now she wishes to receive training for starting her own business, with the aim of devoting more time to her family. This is the reason that has motivated her to request a loan, as she doesn't have resources of her own to undertake this investment.

Her greatest desire is to have her own business and improve the financial circumstances and quality of life of her children.

loans.use: To obtain specialized training for starting her business.

loans.name: Donna

texts.en:
Donna works hard to support her family. Donna is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Donna requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like paint, wood, bamboo, etc. for the reapir of her fishing boat.

Donna has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Donna would like to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like paint, wood, bamboo, etc. for the reapir of her fishing boat

loans.name: Kinsour's Group

texts.en:
Kinsour, age 33, is married and has two kids, both of whom are still in school. He lives with his wife in a rural village in the Phnom Proek district of Battambang Province, Cambodia. He and his wife earn a living by planting corn and rice. Together, they can earn about 15,000 riels (KHR) per day from the current business and manage to save about 5,000 KHR after offsetting expenses.

Kinsour has just started with VisionFund this cycle. He is leading his group of two to apply for a loan. He is going to use his portion to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland. He hopes to increase his family’s income to better his family’s living.

loans.use: To buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland

loans.name: Lida

texts.es: Lida, de 42 años de edad esta casada con Gregorio. Trabajan con perseverancia, para sacar adelante a sus 3 pequeños hijos, a los que cuidan y educan con mucho amor en su casa propia.Lida se dedica al cuidado de sus terrenos de cultivo, donde siembran papa y avena; los que después de cosecharlos los comercializan en el mercado central de la ciudad ya que tiene pensado comprar una casa en el centro de la ciudad, ahí desean tener un negocio de comestibles, como también abrir su granja de cuyes , pues esto le genera muy buenas ganancias y desea invertir más en ello.Este es el tercer crédito con KIVA, donde está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero recibido razón por la cual se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Lida, invertirá los S/.2000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Lida is 42 years old and married to Gregorio. They work tirelessly to raise their three small children, whom they look after and educate with much love in their own home. 

Lida looks after their farmland where they grow potatoes and oats, which after harvesting they sell in the central market of the city. They have thought of buying a house in the center of the city. There they wish to have a business selling foodstuffs and also open a guinea pig farm, as this generates good income and they wish to invest more in it. 

This is their third Kiva loan, and she is very happy for the financial support received; so she promises to be on time in paying her installments. Lida will invest the 2000 soles in the purchase of organic fertilizer for nourishing her crops.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Samang's Group

texts.en:
Age 65 and a local villager from Sangke district of Battambang province, Samang is married and blessed with five children. He strives for a living via working as a local school teacher and manages a mango plantation as the main source of his family’s income. Over his five years' engagement in the current business, he is able to earn up to 32,500 KHR per day. This is not the first loan for Samang with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He managed his past loan wisely to relieve his family’s burden and improve it in a gradual manner. 

For this cycle, he is leading a group of three to apply for a new loan. The total loan for his entire group is 1,100,000 KHR. Samang, whose loan portion is 300,000 KHR, will use his loan to buy gasoline and fertilizer to support his farmland. He hopes that this purchase will help him to boost his crop productivity in a timely manner and return a good yield with high profit.

loans.use: To buy gasoline and fertilizer to support his farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, and fumigation bombs for her coffee crops

loans.name: Luz Elena Del Socorro

texts.es:
Luz Elena de 51 años de edad, es una guerrera a la que las adversidades de la vida no le han robado sus sueños y las ganas de salir adelante. Ama su familia y considera que este es el mejor regalo que Dios ha podido entregarle. 
Laboró por más de doce años en una empresa del Estado. En la actualidad se encuentra desempleada y asegura que las puertas al mundo laboral se le han cerrado debido a su edad. Razón que la ha motivado a crear su propio negocio con el fin de generar el sustento para su hogar.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en capacitarse en la elaboración de bizcochos y cubiertas, con el que espera desarrollar su potencial y comenzar a elaborar tortas para fechas especiales.
texts.en:
Luz Elena, age 51, is a fighter. The adversities of life have not robbed her of her dreams and her desire to get ahead. She loves her family and thinks that it is the best gift that God has given her.
She worked for over twelve years for a state company. She is now unemployed and tells us that the doors to the work world have been closed to her because of her age. This has motivated her to create her own business with the goal of generating an income for her household.
She is requesting a loan which she will invest in getting training to make sponge cake and spreads.

loans.use: to get training in making sponge cake and spreads.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos  tiene  48  años de edad, esta casado y vive con la esposa y cinco  hijos  actualmente. El con crédito pretende comprar unas maquinas para la ebanistería. El piensa comprar estas maquinas con el objetivo de hacer nuevos estilos de muebles y con ello aumentar las ventas y  poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, el no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Carlos is 48, married, and lives with his wife and children. With this loan, he plans to buy some machines for woodworking. He wants to buy these machines with the goal of making new styles of furniture and increasing his sales, thus generating more income for his family. He does not have the necessary capital for this purchase, since he has few resources and does not have a way to acquire the funds. For this reason, he is requesting a loan. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with the best simplicity and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy machines for furniture-making.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Luz Milena

texts.es:
Milena de 31 años, es madre de dos hijos menores de edad. Desde que se casó se ha dedicado a las labores del hogar, con el fin de cuidar de su familia. Desde hace algunos meses su esposo se encuentra desempleado, por lo cual la condición económica de su hogar se ha visto gravemente afectada. 
Con el fin de mejorar los ingresos del hogar, Milena se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de capacitarse en la preparación de comidas rápidas y dedicarse en conjunto con su esposo a la actividad. 
Sueña con crear su propio negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su núcleo familia, garantizándoles a sus hijos una buena educación
texts.en:
Milena, age 31, is a mother of two young children. Since getting married she has done housework with the goal of caring for her family. Her husband has been unemployed for several months, and their household has been gravely effected economically.
With the goal of improving their household income, Milena is requesting a loan so that she can get training in preparing fast food. She and her husband will then work in that area.
She dreams of creating her own business and improving her nuclear family's quality of life, guaranteeing her children a good education.

loans.use: to get training in preparing fast food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to get training in making sponge cake and spreads.

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
María Isabel de 54 años de edad, trabaja como independiente en la elaboración de comidas para eventos desde su residencia. Realizó una técnica en gastronomía y en la actualidad desea complementar sus estudios con la realización de un curso destinado a la elaboración de bizcochos y cubiertas. Espera con dicha capacitación ampliar su portafolio de productos y ofrecerles mayor variedad a sus clientes. 
Sueña en montar su negocio en un local independiente y mejorar la calidad de vida de su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
María Isabel, age 54, works independently making food for events from her home. She has done technical training in gastronomy and now wants to supplement her studies by doing a course in making sponge cake and spreads. She hopes that with this training she will expand her portfolio of products and offer her clients a greater variety.
She dreams of opening her business in an independent shop and improving the quality of life of her nuclear family.

loans.use: to get training in making sponge cake and spreads.

loans.name: Donixa Yojany

texts.es:
Donixa en una joven emprendedora de 21 años de edad, con mucha fuerza, mucha juventud y muchos deseos de salir adelante con su proyecto mismo que trabaja con un material llamado guana con el cual elabora canastas, hamacas, trenzas, escobas, etc. Ella es soltera con un grado de educación secundario completo graduándose como maestra de educación primaria y agradece a sus padres por haber permitido y dado el apoyo para que ella pudiese estudiar. Las manualidades que hoy en día ella práctica las aprendió de su madre misma que hasta hoy en día sigue apoyando. Sus clientes son personas particulares que llegan hasta su taller para poder comprar la variedad de productos y luego revenderlos en la ciudad u otros lugares de comercio como mercados, calles peatonales, etc. El taller es familiar en el cual se involucran la abuela, hermanas, la mama y ella misma.

Hoy en día ella solicita ayuda para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de hamacas ya que de esta forma ella podrá abastecer su taller y podrá tener material para trabajar y seguir generando ingresos para posterior mente re-invertirlo.

Su meta es crecer en producción para que de esa forma ofrecer más a los compradores y clientes directos y poderlos abastecer. Su sueño es hacer crecer su pequeña empresa para poder sacar su producto a otras comunidades o municipios y en un futuro poderlo exportar a otros países.
texts.en:
Donixa is an enterprising 21-year-old young woman with a great deal of strength, youth, and desire to get ahead with her business.  She works with material from balsa trees to make baskets, hammocks, braids, brooms, etc.  She is single and has a secondary education, graduating as a qualified primary school teacher, and she thanks her parents for allowing her to study and for supporting her.  She learned the craftwork she does from her own mother who still supports her to this day.  Her customers are individuals who come to her workshop to buy a variety of products they then resell in the city or in other commercial areas, such as markets, pedestrian streets, etc.  Her workshop is a family affair where her grandmother, sisters, mother, and she herself all work.

She is currently asking for help to buy materials to make hammocks, as this will allow her to stock her workshop and have material to work with to keep generating income she can reinvest later.

Her goal is to increase her production so she can offer more to her buyers and her individual customers and keep them supplied.  Her dream is to make her small business grow so she can launch her product in other communities and municipalities and, in the future, export to other countries.

loans.use: to buy materials to make hammocks

loans.name: María Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia de 52 años de edad, es separada y madre de dos hijas, las cuales educó con sacrificio y esfuerzo debido a que su cónyuge no se hizo responsable de la paternidad.
Laboró por varios años es diferentes empresas del sector comercial, pero debido a un recorte de personal se quedó sin empleo. Desde hace algunos años una de sus hijas es quien la sostiene económicamente, pero debido a la inestabilidad de su trabajo no ha podido solventar los gastos del hogar. Por lo cual Patricia, tomó la decisión recurrir a un crédito con el fin de capacitarse en la creación de empresas y diseño para montar su negocio y generar sus propios ingresos. 
Su mayor deseo es mejor su calidad de vida y convertirse en una mujer de negocios.
texts.en:
Patricia, age 52, is separated and has two daughters. She has educated her daughters with hard work and sacrifice, since her partner has not taken responsibility for his children.
Patricia worked for several years in different businesses in the commercial sector, but she is now unemployed due to a scaling back of personnel. One of her daughters has supported her economically for several years, but because of the instability of her work she has not been able to cover her household costs. For this reason, Patricia has decided to take out a loan in order to get training in business creation and design in order to open her own business and generate her own income.
Her greatest desire is to improve her quality of life and become a business woman.

loans.use: to get training in business creation and design.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es: Martha de 47 años de edad, es tallerísta de manualidades desde hace más de 10 años. Uno de sus grandes sueños es crear su propio negocio por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para capacitarse en el elaboración de productos a base de quesos y calados en conjunto con su cónyuge, quien se encuentra próximo a jubilarse. Sueña con tener una estabilidad económica y brindarles  sus hijos mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en: Martha, age 47, has made handicrafts for over ten years. One of her greatest dreams is to create her own business, so she is requesting a loan for training in making cheese-based products with her husband, who is about to retire. She dreams of having economic stability and offering her children better life opportunities.

loans.use: to get training in making cheese-based products.

loans.name: Andreina

texts.es: Andreina es una joven de 20, desde muy pequeña aprendió al lado de su padre el oficio de agricultora, por lo cual domina perfectamente todo el proceso , ella tiene como proyecto sembrar piña, para lo cual está solicitando un crédito de un millón de colones exactos (1.000.000). Este préstamo lo usará para comprar semilla e insumos agrícolas, obtener una buena cosecha es su objetivo para generar mayores ingresos económicos
texts.en: Andreina is 20. She learned to farm at a young age, at her father's side. She has perfect mastery of the entire process. She now wants to plant pineapple, so she is requesting a loan of exactly one million colones (1 000 000). She will use this loan to purchase seeds and agricultural supplies, in order to obtain a good harvest. This is her goal for making a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds and supplies for planting pineapple.

loans.name: Merli

texts.es: Para Merli la necesidad de tener libertad económica y genera ingresos fue lo que la impulsó a emprender su actividad comercial en la que dese hace 10 años se desempeña. Ella vende mercancía que compra directamente a sus proveedores en el mercado y a empresas que impulsan sus productos mediante guías especializadas. Merli ha concentrado clientes fijos a los que les ofrece artículos con descuentos especiales y esto hace que su clientela no la cambie para buscar mejores alternativas. Los productos que más rotan en su punto comercial son la papelería y artículos para el hogar, ella siempre está pendiente de hacer crecer su capital de trabajo para ser oportuna en sus respuestas a sus clientes. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará productos de belleza, variedades femeninas entre otros artículos. Sus esfuerzos en el servicio se ven reflejados en su intenso horario de lunes a domingos desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, porque ella está decidida a crecer y a hacer de su negocio una gran empresa.
texts.en: For Merli, the necessity of having economic liberty and generating an income drove her to start her business ten years ago. She sells merchandise that she buys directly from the suppliers and from companies that sell their products through specialized guides. She has fixed clients to whom she offers products with special discounts, which keeps them from looking for better alternatives. Her most popular products are stationery items and home items. She is always trying to increase her working capital in order to respond to her clients quickly. This is just the reason for which she is requesting a Kiva loan, her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will purchase beauty products for women, and other items. Her hard work to provide good service is reflected in her intense schedule; she works every day from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm because she is determined to grow and make her business a great enterprise.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for women, and other items.

loans.name: Zohra

texts.en: Zohra is 54 years old and married. She owns and operates a bakery in her local area, to earn a living. She has been in her business for over two years and earns a stable income, every month. She has applied to VFAC, to gain access to financial services that may help her to improve her business and living situation. She wants to buy dough-blending equipment. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: To buy dough-blending equipment.

loans.name: Reconciliacion Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Jenny tiene 48 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos de 28, 25 y 19 años de edad, su negocio es la hecha y venta de tortillas así como frijoles cosidos y leña. Su nuera le ayuda a echar las tortillas en el negocio junto con ella. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de masecas por quintal, frijoles crudos por quintal, flete de leñas. Cándida tiene 51 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de refrescos naturales y sopas los fines de semana y Consuelo tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es  una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three associates, one of them is Jenny who is 48 years old, single and has three children who are 28, 25 and 19 years old. Her business is making and selling tortillas as well as cooked beans and firewood. Her mother in law helps her to make the tortillas in her business alongside Jenny. The loan will be invested in purchase flour by the pound, raw beans and firewood. Cándida is 51 years old and her business is selling natural refreshments and soaps on the weekends and Consuelo is 52 years old and her business is running a grocery store out of her home.

loans.use: purchase basic necessities like flour by the pound, beans, and firewood.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 43 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre y súper entusiasta, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 19 y 09 años de edad respectivamente.Carmen se dedica a la venta de comidas por está razón se inicia muy temprano, sale a comprar el mercado para abastecerse de diversos productos tales como arroz, azúcar, hojas de Bijao,  pescado, plátanos, camu - camu, condimentos , entre otros. En la tarde prepara sus deliciosas comidas.  Todos estos  alimentos los vende en el frontis  de su casa en una mesa grande, lleva en este lugar 6 años, tiene un buen ingreso económico. Durante todo este tiempo con sus ganancias amplio su vivienda.Al  principio fue difícil conseguir la clientela por el lugar donde está ubicado su negocio, pero con el tiempo la gente la fue recomendandola por su buen trato y sus deliciosas viandas y pudo aumentar su clientela. Espera poder crecer en este trabajo ya que tiene muchas expectativas a futuro.Este será su préstamo numero 05 con Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero recibido .Con el monto solicitado de 3000  soles comprará productos al por mayor tales como arroz, aceite, condimentos, plátano,  y además comprará algunas sillas para la comodidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Carmen, age 43, is a very happy and enthusiastic woman. She is married and lives in her own home with her husband and two children, ages 19 and 9. Carmen sells food; so she gets up really early to go to the market and stock up on various items such as rice, sugar, bijao leaves, fish, bananas, camu camu, and condiments. In the afternoons she prepares her delicious foods. She sells her food from the front of her home on a large table. She has worked in this spot for six years and has a good income. During this time, she has used her income to expand her home. 
In the beginning it was hard to build up clientele because of her business' location, but with time people started to recommend her business because of her good customer service and her delicious food; her clientele expanded.
She hopes to expand her business because she has many plans for the future. This will be her fifth loan on Kiva and she is very grateful for the financial support. With the requested 3000 soles, she will buy products wholesale such as rice, oil, condiments, and bananas. She will also buy some chairs for her customers' comfort.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, condiments, and other items.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty, de 24 años de edad es una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy responsable. Realiza sus actividades laborales junto a su esposo Cristián quien se dedica a la soldadura, hace puertas de metal.  Ellos tienen un hijo;  junto a ellos viven  su hermano y su cuñada  con sus cuatro hijos.Betty se dedica al armado de puertas, ventanas y escaleras de estructura metálica. Junto a su esposo salen a buscar clientes en distintos lugares donde requieran estos servicios. Lleva trabajando  3 años en esta actividad. Este rubro le brinda muchas ganancias ya que la ciudad empieza  a crecer y hay más construcciones que necesitan de sus servicios en el área de carpintería metálica.Cada vez los lugares donde los requieren se hace mas distante a su hogar, por ello acaban de comprar un mototaxi para transportar sus herramientas de trabajo el cual consta de una maquina soldadora,  su cortadora de fierro y otros implementos más. Le gusta su trabajo porque ama lo que hace, le va muy bien ya que cada vez tiene más clientes y eso le permite estar generando ingresos en cada momento. Espera posteriormente  poder abrir un taller propio y así incrementar sus ganancias  para dar oportunidad de trabajo a otras personas.Este será su préstamo  numero 06 con Kiva y se siente muy agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindad económicamente .Con el monto solicitado de 1500 soles comprará algunos materiales como  fierros, planchas de aluminio y  equipos de soldadura  que le hacen falta para su trabajo carpintería metálica.
texts.en:
Betty, age 24, is an honest, hard-working, and, above all, responsible woman. She works with her husband, Cristián, who is a welder and makes metal doors. They have one child. Betty's brother and sister-in-law and their four children live with them. Betty assembles metal doors, windows and stairs. This work makes a good income because the city is starting to grow and there are more construction projects that need metal carpentry services.
Every time, requests are made from work sites further away from their home. Because of this, they just bought a mototaxi to transport their work tools, which include a soldering machine, an iron cutter, and other items. Betty likes her work because she loves what she does. It is going very well for her because their clientele keeps growing, and this means that they keep making a greater income. In the future, she hopes to open her own workshop and thus increase her income and provide work opportunities for other people. This will be her sixth loan on Kiva and she is very grateful for the economic opportunity. With the requested 1500 soles, she will buy supplies such as metal, aluminium planks, and soldering equipment that she needs for her work in metal carpentry.

loans.use: to buy metal, aluminium planks, and soldering equipment.

loans.name: Sohoede

texts.fr: Revendeuse de charbons de bois, haricot, de farine et autres produits alimentaires à domicile, madame Sohoede  a pour mari un chauffeur. Elle est mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés. L’ainé est âgé de 18ans et le dernier 11ans. Elle sollicite son second prêt à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Le bénéfice tiré de la vente lui permettra d’ouvrir une boutique d’alimentation générale et assurer les moindres besoins de la famille. Âgée de 44ans, elle a une ancienneté de 16ans dans l’activité.
texts.en: Madame Sohoede sells charcoal, beans, flour, and other food items out of her home. Madame Sohoede is married to a driver. She is the mother of three children who all go to school. The oldest child is 18 and the youngest is 11. She is asking for a second loan from WAGES to buy goods. The profits from her sales will allow her to open a grocery shop and ensure her family's needs. She is 44 years old and has worked in the business for 16 years.

loans.use: to buy charcoal, beans, and other food items.

loans.name: Las Glorias 2 Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo que está formado  por tres miembros una de ellas es Gloria Elena tiene 51 años de edad, es viuda, tiene 7 años que vende gaseosas, hielo, helados, jugos, refrescos naturales, cervezas en lata, tiene 6 años de ser cliente de  la institución y ha demostrado ser una persona responsable, tiene cinco hijos ya mayores quienes le ayudan en la atención del negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas variadas, jugos en lata, jugos en cajas de sabores, frutas frescas como naranjas dulces, guayaba  para frescos, etc. en el crédito anterior con las utilidades que le genero compro gaseosa en mayor cantidad de lo acostumbrado y de distintos sabores, Gloria Angelina tiene 45 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Facundina tiene 52 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa y reposterías.
texts.en:
This is a group made up of three members, one of whom - Gloria Elena - is 51 and a widow. She has been selling pop, ice, ice cream, juice, natural drinks, and beer for seven years. She has been a client of the institution for six years and has proven herself to be a responsible person. She has five grown children who help her by working in the business. She will invest this loan in the purchase of a variety of pop, canned juice, flavoured juice boxes, and fresh fruit like sweet oranges and guava for making juice, etc.
With her previous loan, she used her income to buy a greater quantity of pop than usual, and she bought several different flavours.
Gloria Angelina is 45 and sells new clothing. Facundina is 52 and sells clothing and confectionery.

loans.use: to buy pop, juice boxes, canned juice, and fresh fruit like sweet oranges and guava for making drinks, etc.

loans.name: Awatef

texts.en:
Awatef is a married client from Iraq. She is 39 years old and has four children. Awatef assists her husband in providing the family income. She is a dressmaker and works from home. She specializes in tailoring women's outfits and children's clothes. She has been making clothes ever since she was a child, having begun by helping her mother, who was also a dressmaker. She gained years of experience from her mother and then, in 2002, Awatef took tailoring to the next level and started tailoring for a living. She developed an excellent reputation in her neighborhood, thanks to her clean work and on-time delivery.

Awatef is requesting a loan of 2,500 USD. She will use the loan to buy a sewing machine, a motorized generator, and an air conditioner. She is aiming to grow her business, so that she will continue to support her husband and be able to educate their children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, a motorized generator, and an air conditioner

loans.name: Joyce
